entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, i the snake no pot constrènyer a cap altre objectiu.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Acid Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales acid in a 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany d'àcid; si supera, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Slowing Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales gas en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitució saving throw. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The couatl's spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 14} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament requiring only verbal components

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The couatl's són màgics.

trait.name: Shielded Mind
entries: The couatl is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, or detect its location.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 13} o be {@condition poisoned} for 24 hours. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition unconscious}. Another creature can use an action to shake the target awake.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the couatl can't constrict another target.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The couatl magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the couatl's choice).

In a new form, the couatl retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Força, Destresa, and other actions are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks. If the new form has a bite attack, the couatl can use its bite in that form.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The crab pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 dany contundent.

monster.name: Ma Reptadora
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Immunitat a l'Expulsió
entries: The claw is immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning or slashing damage (claw's choice).

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The crocodile pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 12} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the crocodile can't bite another target

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The fanatic és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 4. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The fanatic fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The cyclops makes two greatclub attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The dao és Carisma ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The dao can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the dao doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the dao dies, its body disintegrates into crystalline powder, leaving behind only equipment the dao was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The dao has advantage on Força and Destresa saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The Dao makes two fist attacks or two maul attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Força check or be knocked {@condition prone}.

variant.name: Genie Powers
entries: Genies have a variety of magical capabilities, including spells. A few have even greater powers that allow them to alter their appearance or the nature of reality.

entries.name: Disguises
entries: Some genies can veil themselves in illusion to pass as other similarly shaped creatures. Such genies can innately cast the {@spell disguise self} spell at will, often with a longer duration than is normal for that spell. Mightier genies can cast the {@spell true polymorph} spell one to three times per day, possibly with a longer duration than normal. Such genies can change only their own shape, but a rare few can use the spell on other creatures and objects as well.

entries.name: Wishes
entries: The genie power to grant wishes is legendary among mortals. Only the most potent genies, such as those among the nobility, can do so. A particular genie that has this power can grant one to three wishes to a creature that isn't a genie. Once a genie has granted its limit of wishes, it can't grant wishes again for some amount of time (usually 1 year), and cosmic law dictates that the same genie can expend its limit of wishes on a specific creature only once in that creature's existence.

To be granted a wish, a creature within 60 feet of the genie states a desired effect to it. The genie can then cast the {@spell wish} spell on the creature's behalf to bring about the effect. Depending on the genie's nature, the genie might try to pervert the intent of the wish by exploiting the wish's poor wording. The perversion of the wording is usually crafted to be to the genie's benefit.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The darkmantle can't use its visió a cegues while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si darkmantle es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un cave formation such as a stalactite or stalagmite.

action.name: Crush
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent, and the darkmantle attaches to the target. If the target is Medium or smaller and the darkmantle has advantage on the attack roll, it attaches by engulfing the target's head, and the target is also {@condition blinded} and unable to breathe while the darkmantle is attached in this way.

While attached to the target, the darkmantle can attack no other creature except the target but has advantage on its attack rolls. The darkmantle's speed also becomes 0, it can't benefit from any bonus to its speed, and it moves with the target.
A creature can detach the darkmantle by making a successful {@dc 13} Força check as an action. On its turn, the darkmantle can detach itself from the target by using 5 feet of movement.

action.name: Darkness Aura (1/Dia)
entries: A 15-foot radius of magical darkness extends out from the darkmantle, moves with it, and spreads around corners. The darkness lasts as long as the darkmantle maintains concentration, up to 10 minutes (as if concentrating on a spell). Darkvision can't penetrate this darkness, and no natural light can illuminate it. If any of the darkness overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell creating the light is dispelled.

trait.name: Two-Headed
entries: The dog has advantage on Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, or knocked {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dog makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitució saving throw against disease or become {@condition poisoned} until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the creature must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) on a failure. This reduction lasts until the disease is cured. The creature dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The death knight is a 19th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de paladí preparats:

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The death knight té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Marshal Undead
entries: Unless the death knight is {@condition incapacitated}, it and undead creatures of its choice within 60 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against features that turn undead.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The death knight makes three longsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany tallant, o 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany tallant if used with two hands, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Hellfire Orb (1/Dia)
entries: The death knight hurls a magical ball of fire that explodes at a point it can see within 120 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18}. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) de dany de foc and 35 ({@damage 10d6}) de dany necròtic on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The death knight adds 6 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the death knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The slaad és Carisma ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The slaad pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The slaad té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The slaad's són màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The slaad fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws or greatsword.

action.name: Bite (Slaad Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Claws (Slaad Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic.

variant.name: Control Gem
entries: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being {@condition charmed} while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against {@spell imprisonment}, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A {@spell wish} spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A {@spell greater restoration} spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Saviesa (Medicine) can remove the gem from an {@condition incapacitated} slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful {@dc 20} Saviesa (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany psíquic to the slaad.

trait.name: Negative Energy Cone
entries: The death tyrant's central eye emits an {@condition invisible}, magical 150-foot cone of negative energy. At the start of each of its turns, the tyrant decides which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active.

Any creature in that area can't regain hit points. Any humanoid that dies there becomes a {@creature zombie} under the tyrant's command. The dead humanoid retains its place in the initiative order and animates at the start of its next turn, provided that its body hasn't been completely destroyed.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: The death tyrant shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 feet of it:

items.name: 1. Charm Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the death tyrant for 1 hour, or until the death tyrant harms the creature.

items.name: 2. Paralyzing Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 3. Fear Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 4. Slowing Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Destresa saving throw. On a failed save, the target's speed is halved for 1 minute. In addition, the creature can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. La criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 5. Enervation Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17}. Qui falli rep 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany necròtic; si supera, en rep la meitat.

items.name: 6. Telekinetic Ray.
entries: If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Força saving throw or the death tyrant moves it up to 30 feet in any direction. It is {@condition restrained} by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the death tyrant's next turn or until the death tyrant is {@condition incapacitated}.

If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The death tyrant can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

items.name: 7. Sleep Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Saviesa saving throw or fall asleep and remain {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. The target awakens if it takes damage or another creature takes an action to wake it. This ray has no effect on constructs and undead.

items.name: 8. Petrification Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 17}. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} until freed by the  {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

items.name: 9. Disintegration Ray.
entries: If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Destresa saving throw or take 45 ({@damage 10d8}) de dany de força. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust.

If the target is a Large or smaller nonmagical object or creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge or larger object or creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.

items.name: 10. Death Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Destresa saving throw or take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany necròtic. The target dies if the ray reduces it to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Eye Ray
entries: The death tyrant uses one random eye ray.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The gnome és Intel·ligència ({@dc 11} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The gnome has advantage on Destresa (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Astúcia Gnoma
entries: The gnome té avantatge a salvar per Intel·ligència, Saviesa, i Carisma contra màgia.

action.name: War Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Poisoned Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 12} o be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the demilich is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the demilich falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Immunitat a l'Expulsió
entries: The demilich is immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: Howl {@recharge 5}
entries: The demilich emits a bloodcurdling howl. Each creature within 30 feet of the demilich that can hear the howl must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitució saving throw or drop to 0 hit points. On a successful save, the creature is {@condition frightened} fins el final del seu proper torn.

action.name: Drenar Vida
entries: The demilich targets up to three creatures that it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitució saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany necròtic, and the demilich regains hit points equal to the total damage dealt to all targets.

legendary.name: Flight
entries: The demilich flies up to half its flying speed.

legendary.name: Cloud of Dust
entries: The demilich magically swirls its dusty remains. Each creature within 10 feet of the demilich, including around a corner, must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the demilich's next turn. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this effect until the end of the demilich's next turn.

legendary.name: Energy Drain (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Each creature with in 30 feet of the demilich ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. On a failed save, the creature's hit point maximum is magically reduced by 10 ({@dice 3d6}). If a creature's hit point maximum is reduced to 0 by this effect, the creature dies. A creature's hit point maximum can be restored with the  {@spell greater restoration} spell or similar magic.

legendary.name: Vile Curse (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The demilich targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Saviesa saving throw or be magically cursed. Until the curse ends, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the curse on a success.

variant.name: Acererak and His Disciples
entries: The transformation into a demilich isn't a bitter end for all liches that experience it. Made as a conscious choice, the path of the demilich becomes the next step in a dark evolution. The lich Acererak—a powerful wizard and demonologist and the infamous master of the Tomb of Horrors—anticipated his own transformation, preparing for it by setting enchanted gemstones into his skull's eye sockets and teeth. Each of these soul gems possessed the power to capture the souls on which his phylactery would feed.

Acererak abandoned his physical body, accepting that it would molder and dissolve to dust while he traveled the planes as a disembodied consciousness. If the skull that was his last physical remains was ever disturbed, its gems would claim the souls of the insolent intruders to his tomb, magically transferring them to his phylactery.

Liches who follow Acererak's path believe that by becoming free of their bodies, they can continue their quest for power beyond the mortal world. As their patron did, they secure their remains within well-guarded vaults, using soul gems to maintain their phylacteries and destroy the adventurers who disturb their lairs.
Acererak or another demilich like him has a challenge rating of 21 (33,000 PX), o 23 (50,000 PX) in its lair, and gains the following additional action option.

entries.name: Trap Soul
entries: The demilich targets one creature that it can see within 30 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 19}. On a failed save, the target's soul is magically trapped inside one of the demilich's gems. While the soul is trapped, the target's body and all the equipment it is carrying cease to exist. On a successful save, the target takes 24 ({@damage 7d6}) de dany necròtic, and if this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, its soul is trapped as if it failed the saving throw. A soul trapped in a gem for 24 hours is devoured and ceases to exist.

If the demilich drops to 0 hit points, it is destroyed and turns to powder, leaving behind its gems. Crushing a gem releases any soul trapped within, at which point the target's body re-forms in an unoccupied space nearest to the gem and in the same state as when it was trapped.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The deva's spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 17} salvació de conjur). The deva pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament requiring only verbal components

trait.name: Armes Angelicals
entries: Els atacs armats de The deva's són màgics. Quan the deva impacta amb qualsevol arma, fa {@dice 4d8} de dany radiant extra (inclòs a l'atac).

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The deva té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The deva fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Maça
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany radiant.

action.name: Toc Curatiu (3/Dia)
entries: The deva touches another creature. The target magically regains 20 ({@dice 4d8 + 2}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The deva magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the deva's choice).

In a new form, the deva retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Força, Destresa, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The wolf has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin escoltar or smell.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the displacer beast is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Displacement
entries: The displacer beast projects a magical illusion that makes it appear to be standing near its actual location, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted fins el final del seu proper torn. This trait is also disrupted while the displacer beast is {@condition incapacitated} or has a speed of 0.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The displacer beast fa dos atacs with its tentacles.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The djinni és Carisma ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

3e: {@spell create food and water} (can create wine instead of water)

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the djinni dies, its body disintegrates into a warm breeze, leaving behind only equipment the djinni was wearing or carrying.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The djinni makes three scimitar attacks.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning or thunder damage (djinni's choice).

action.name: Create Whirlwind
entries: A 5-foot-radius, 30-foot-tall cylinder of swirling air magically forms on a point the djinni can see within 120 feet of it. The whirlwind lasts as long as the djinni maintains concentration (as if concentrating on a spell). Any creature but the djinni that enters the whirlwind must succeed on a {@dc 18} Força saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by it. The djinni can move the whirlwind up to 60 feet as an action, and creatures {@condition restrained} by the whirlwind move with it. The whirlwind ends if the djinni loses sight of it.

A creature can use its action to free a creature {@condition restrained} by the whirlwind, including itself, by succeeding on a {@dc 18} Força check. If the check succeeds, the creature is no longer {@condition restrained} and moves to the nearest space outside the whirlwind.

variant.name: Genie Powers
entries: Genies have a variety of magical capabilities, including spells. A few have even greater powers that allow them to alter their appearance or the nature of reality.

entries.name: Disguises
entries: Some genies can veil themselves in illusion to pass as other similarly shaped creatures. Such genies can innately cast the {@spell disguise self} spell at will, often with a longer duration than is normal for that spell. Mightier genies can cast the {@spell true polymorph} spell one to three times per day, possibly with a longer duration than normal. Such genies can change only their own shape, but a rare few can use the spell on other creatures and objects as well.

entries.name: Wishes
entries: The genie power to grant wishes is legendary among mortals. Only the most potent genies, such as those among the nobility, can do so. A particular genie that has this power can grant one to three wishes to a creature that isn't a genie. Once a genie has granted its limit of wishes, it can't grant wishes again for some amount of time (usually 1 year), and cosmic law dictates that the same genie can expend its limit of wishes on a specific creature only once in that creature's existence.

To be granted a wish, a creature within 60 feet of the genie states a desired effect to it. The genie can then cast the {@spell wish} spell on the creature's behalf to bring about the effect. Depending on the genie's nature, the genie might try to pervert the intent of the wish by exploiting the wish's poor wording. The perversion of the wording is usually crafted to be to the genie's benefit.

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The doppelganger can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the doppelganger has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Atac Sorpresa
entries: Si the doppelganger sorprèn a una criatura i l'impacta durant la primera ronda de combat, l'objectiu rep, adicionalment, 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The doppelganger fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Read Thoughts
entries: The doppelganger magically reads the surface thoughts of one creature within 60 feet of it. The effect can penetrate barriers, but 3 feet of wood or dirt, 2 feet of stone, 2 inches of metal, or a thin sheet of lead blocks it. While the target is in range, the doppelganger can continue reading its thoughts, as long as the doppelganger's concentration isn't broken (as if concentrating on a spell). While reading the target's mind, the doppelganger has advantage on Saviesa ({@skill Insight}) and Carisma ({@skill Deception}, {@skill Intimidation}, and {@skill Persuasion}) checks against the target.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The dragon turtle pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dragon turtle fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws. It can make one atac de cua in place of its two claw attacks.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Força saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the dragon turtle and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Alè de Steam {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon turtle exhales scalding steam en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18}. Qui falli rep 52 ({@damage 15d6}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.

monster.name: Dretch
languages: telepatía 60 peus (works only with creatures that understand Abyssal)

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dretch fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Fetid Cloud (1/Dia)
entries: A 10-foot radius of disgusting green gas extends out from the dretch. The gas spreads around corners, and its area is lightly obscured. It lasts for 1 minute or until a strong wind disperses it. Any creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both, and can't take reactions.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The drider és Saviesa ({@dc 13} salvació de conjur). The drider pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The drider has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drider to sleep.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The drider pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The drider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drider fa tres atacs, either with its longsword or its longbow. It can replace one of those attacks with a bite attack.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de verí.

variant.name: Drider Spellcasting
entries: Driders that were once drow spellcasters might retain their ability to cast spells. Such driders typically have a higher spellcasting ability (15 or 16) than other driders. Further, the drider gains the Spellcasting trait. A drider that was a drow divine spellcaster, therefore, could have a Saviesa of 16 (+3) and a Spellcasting trait as follows.

Spellcasting. The drider is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Saviesa ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The drider has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:

items: 1st level (4 slots): {@spell bane}, {@spell detect magic}, {@spell sanctuary}
4th level (2 slots): {@spell divination}, {@spell freedom of movement}

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The drow's spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 11} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 13} o be {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition unconscious} while {@condition poisoned} in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.
Drow often wear magic armor and carry magic weapons that lose their enhancement bonuses permanently if they are exposed to sunlight for 1 hour or longer.
A {@creature drow} wearing a {@item +1 chain shirt} and carrying a {@item +1 shortsword} has AC 16 and a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls with shortsword attacks.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The drow's spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 12} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drow makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 13} o be {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition unconscious} while {@condition poisoned} in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The drow adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the drow must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
Drow often wear magic armor and carry magic weapons that lose their enhancement bonuses permanently if they are exposed to sunlight for 1 hour or longer.

A {@creature drow elite warrior} wearing {@item +2 Armadura de Cuir Tatxonada||+2 cuir tatxonat} and carrying a {@item +2 shortsword} has AC 20 and a +2 bonus on attack and damage rolls with shortsword attacks.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The drow's spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 12} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The drow is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The drow has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany contundent, o 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) de dany contundent if used with two hands, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The drow magically summons a {@creature quasit}, or attempts to summon a {@creature shadow demon} with a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of success. The summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The drow's spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 15} salvació de conjur). She pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The drow is a 10th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Saviesa (save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The drow has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drow makes two scourge attacks.

action.name: Scourge
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The drow attempts to magically summon a {@creature yochlol} with a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of success. If the attempt fails, the drow takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany psíquic. Otherwise, the summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.
Drow often wear magic armor and carry magic weapons that lose their enhancement bonuses permanently if they are exposed to sunlight for 1 hour or longer.
A {@creature drow priestess of lolth} wearing {@item +3 scale mail} has AC 19.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The druid és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 4. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de druida preparats:

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar ({@hit 4} a impactar with shillelagh), 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent, 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany contundent if wielded with two hands, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent with {@spell shillelagh}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The dryad's és Saviesa ({@dc 14} per salvar conjur). The dryad pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The dryad té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: The dryad can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Tree Stride
entries: Once on her turn, the dryad can use 10 feet of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her abast and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be large or bigger.

action.name: Garrot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar ({@hit 6} a impactar with shillelagh), 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany contundent, o 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent with shillelagh.

action.name: Fey Charm
entries: The dryad targets one humanoid or beast that she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see the dryad, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Saviesa saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed}. The {@condition charmed} creature regards the dryad as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the dryad's control, it takes the dryad's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can.

Each time the dryad or its allies do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the dryad dies, is on a different plane of existence from the target, or ends the effect as a bonus action. If a target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the dryad's Fey Charm for the next 24 hours.
The dryad can have no more than one humanoid and up to three beasts {@condition charmed} at a time.

trait.name: Duergar Resilience
entries: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition charmed} or {@condition paralyzed}.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Enlarge (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Força-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Força checks and Força saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

action.name: War Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) de dany perforant while enlarged.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany perforant while enlarged.

action.name: Invisibility (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The duergar magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

trait.name: Ideologia Axiomàtica
entries: The duodron can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Desintegració
entries: If the duodron dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The duodron makes two fist attacks or two javelin attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant.

variant.name: Rogue Modrons
entries: A modron unit sometimes becomes defective, either through natural decay or exposure to chaotic forces. Rogue modrons don't act in accordance with Primus's wishes and directives, breaking laws, disobeying orders, and even engaging in violence. Other modrons hunt down such rogues.
A rogue modron loses the Axiomatic Mind trait and can have any alignment other than lawful neutral. Otherwise, it has the same statistics as a regular modron of its rank.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Dia)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell sleep}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Carisma.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of dust. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. A {@condition blinded} creature can repeat the saving throw on each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Blinding Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of blinding dust. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a {@dc 10} Destresa saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

variant.name: Summon Mephits (1/Dia)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The eagle has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The elemental fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The efreeti és Carisma ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the efreeti dies, its body disintegrates in a flash of fire and puff of smoke, leaving behind only equipment the djinni was wearing or carrying.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The efreeti makes two scimitar attacks or uses its Hurl Flame twice.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany de foc.

variant.name: Genie Powers
entries: Genies have a variety of magical capabilities, including spells. A few have even greater powers that allow them to alter their appearance or the nature of reality.

entries.name: Disguises
entries: Some genies can veil themselves in illusion to pass as other similarly shaped creatures. Such genies can innately cast the {@spell disguise self} spell at will, often with a longer duration than is normal for that spell. Mightier genies can cast the {@spell true polymorph} spell one to three times per day, possibly with a longer duration than normal. Such genies can change only their own shape, but a rare few can use the spell on other creatures and objects as well.

entries.name: Wishes
entries: The genie power to grant wishes is legendary among mortals. Only the most potent genies, such as those among the nobility, can do so. A particular genie that has this power can grant one to three wishes to a creature that isn't a genie. Once a genie has granted its limit of wishes, it can't grant wishes again for some amount of time (usually 1 year), and cosmic law dictates that the same genie can expend its limit of wishes on a specific creature only once in that creature's existence.

To be granted a wish, a creature within 60 feet of the genie states a desired effect to it. The genie can then cast the {@spell wish} spell on the creature's behalf to bring about the effect. Depending on the genie's nature, the genie might try to pervert the intent of the wish by exploiting the wish's poor wording. The perversion of the wording is usually crafted to be to the genie's benefit.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: Si el elephant es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Tossada, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 12}. Si falla, està {@condition prone}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition prone}, el elephant pot fer un atac Esclafar com a acció bonus.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Esclafar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura {@condition prone} . {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the elk moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Envestir
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura {@condition prone} . {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The empyrean és Carisma ({@dc 23} salvada de conjur, {@hit 15} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the empyrean falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The empyrean té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The empyrean's són màgics.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}31 ({@damage 6d6 + 10}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the empyrean's next turn.

action.name: Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 15} a impactar, 600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}24 ({@dice 7d6}) damage of one of the following types (empyrean's choice): acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, radiant, or thunder.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The empyrean makes one attack.

legendary.name: Bolster
entries: The empyrean bolsters all nonhostile creatures within 120 feet of it fins el final del seu proper torn. Bolstered creatures can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, and they gain advantage on ability checks and saving throws until the end of the empyrean's next turn.

legendary.name: Trembling Strike (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The empyrean strikes the ground with its maul, triggering an earth tremor. All other creatures on the ground within 60 feet of the empyrean must succeed on a {@dc 25} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Hellish Weapons
entries: Els atacs armats de The erinyes's són màgics and deal an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany de verí on a hit (included in the attacks).

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The erinyes té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The erinyes fa tres atacs.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant if used with two hands, plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany de verí, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 14} o be {@condition poisoned}. The poison lasts until it is removed by the {@spell lesser restoration} spell or similar magic.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The erinyes adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the erinyes must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

variant.name: Rope of Entanglement
entries: Some erinyes carry a {@item rope of entanglement} (detailed in the Dungeon Master's Guide). When such an erinyes uses its Multiattack, the erinyes can use the rope in place of two of the attacks.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The ettercap pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the ettercap knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The ettercap ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The ettercap fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de verí. The target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. La criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Web {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/60 peus d'abast, one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The creature is {@condition restrained} by webbing. As an action, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a {@dc 11} Força check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 10, 5 hit points, is vulnerable to fire damage and immune to bludgeoning, poison and psychic damage.

variant.name: Web Garrote
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Medium or Small creature against which the ettercap has advantage on the attack roll. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 12} per escapar). Until this grapple ends, the target can't breathe, and the ettercap has advantage on attack rolls against it.

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The ettin has advantage on Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: When one of the ettin's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The ettin fa dos atacs: one with its battleaxe and one with its morningstar.

action.name: Destral de guerra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The dragon's és Saviesa ({@dc 13} per salvar conjur). It can innately cast a number of spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: The Colors of Age
entries: A faerie dragon's scales change hue as it ages, moving through all the colors of the rainbow. All faerie dragons have innate spellcasting ability, gaining new spells as they mature.
Red—5 years or less
Orange—6–10 years
Yellow—11–20 years
Green—21–30 years
Blue—31–40 years
Indigo—41–50 years
Violet—51 years or more
A green or older faerie dragon's CR increases to 2.

trait.name: Superior Invisibility
entries: As a bonus action, the dragon can magically turn {@condition invisible} until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the dragon wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: Using telepathy, the dragon can magically communicate with any other faerie dragon within 60 feet of it.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The faerie dragon té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}1 piercing damage.

action.name: Alè de Euphoria {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a puff of euphoria gas at one creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Saviesa saving throw, or for 1 minute, the target can't take reactions and must roll a {@dice d6} at the start of each of its turns to determine its behavior during the turn:
1–4. The target takes no action or bonus action and uses all of its movement to move in a random direction.
5–6. The target doesn't move, and the only thing it can do on its turn is make a {@dc 11} Saviesa saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Mossegada

action.name: Alè de Euphoria {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a puff of euphoria gas at one creature within 5 feet of it. 1–4. The target takes no action or bonus action and uses all of its movement to move in a random direction.
5–6. The target doesn't move, and the only thing it can do on its turn is make a {@dc 11} Saviesa saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 feet.

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The elemental makes two touch attacks.

action.name: Tocar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany de foc. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) de dany contundent.

variant.name: New Giant Options
entries: Some adult fire giants are trained to lay siege to strongholds and break through enemy lines. These abilities are represented by the following traits.

entries.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The giant fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

entries.name: Tackle
entries: When the giant enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy must succeed on a {@dc 19} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the snake or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The snake fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany contundent mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The flameskull és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). It requires no somatic or material components to cast its spells. The flameskull has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The flameskull sheds either dim light in a 15-foot radius, or bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. It can switch between the options as an action.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The flameskull té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If the flameskull is destroyed, it regains all its hit points in 1 hour unless holy water is sprinkled on its remains or a dispel magic or {@spell remove curse} spell is cast on them.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The flameskull uses Fire Ray twice.

action.name: Fire Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} a impactar, 30 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc.

monster.name: Flesh Golem

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

languages: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk golem, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The golem must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a {@dc 15} Carisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the golem might go berserk again.

trait.name: Aversion of Fire
entries: If the golem takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The golem té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The golem's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Advanced Telepathy
entries: The flumph can perceive the content of any telepathic communication used within 60 feet of it, and it can't be surprised by creatures with any form of telepathy.

trait.name: Prone Deficiency
entries: If the flumph is knocked {@condition prone}, roll a die. On an odd result, the flumph lands upside-down and is {@condition incapacitated}. At the end of each of its turns, the flumph can make a {@dc 10} Destresa saving throw, righting itself and ending the {@condition incapacitated} condition if it succeeds.

trait.name: Telepathic Shroud
entries: The flumph is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as all divination spells.

action.name: Tendrils
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany d'àcid. At the end of each of its turns, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10}, taking 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany d'àcid on a failure or ending the recurring acid damage on a success. A {@spell lesser restoration} spell cast on the target also ends the recurring acid damage.

action.name: Stench Spray (1/Dia)
entries: Each creature en un con de 15 peus originating from the flumph must succeed on a {@dc 10} Destresa saving throw or be coated in a foul-smelling liquid. A coated creature exudes a horrible stench for {@dice 1d4} hours. The coated creature is {@condition poisoned} as long as the stench lasts, and other creatures are {@condition poisoned} while with in 5 feet of the coated creature. A creature can remove the stench on itself by using a short rest to bathe in water, alcohol, or vinegar.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The snake no provoca atacs d'oportunitats quan surt volant de l'abast d'un enemic

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 3d4}) de dany de verí.

monster.name: Flying Sword
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Debilitat Antimàgica
entries: The sword is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the sword must succeed on a Constitució saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the sword remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal sword.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The fomorian attacks twice with its greatclub or makes one greatclub attack and uses Evil Eye once.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Evil Eye
entries: The fomorian magically forces a creature it can see within 60 feet of it to make a {@dc 14} Carisma saving throw. The creature takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany psíquic on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Curse of the Evil Eye (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: With a stare, the fomorian uses Evil Eye, but on a failed save, the creature is also cursed with magical deformities. While deformed, the creature has its speed halved and has disadvantage on ability checks, saving throws, and attacks based on Força or Destresa.
The transformed creature can repeat the saving throw whenever it finishes a long rest, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The frog pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The frog's long jump is up to 10 feet and its high jump is up to 5 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) de dany contundent.

variant.name: New Giant Options
entries: Some adult frost giants are skilled hunters who construct and hurl nets weighted down with fragments of metal or bone. This ability is represented by the following action option.

entries.name: Weighted Net
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, ranged 20/60 ft., one Small, Medium, or Large creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} until it escapes the net. Any creature can use its action to make a {@dc 17} Força check to free itself or another creature in the net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 15 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) destroys the net and frees the target.

walk.condition: (30 ft. when rolling, 60 ft. rolling downhill)

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si galeb duhr es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal boulder.

trait.name: Rolling Charge
entries: If the galeb duhr rolls at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Animate Boulders (1/Dia)
entries: The galeb duhr magically animates up to two boulders it can see within 60 feet of it. A boulder has statistics like those of a galeb duhr, except it has Intel·ligència 1 and Carisma 1, it can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, and it lacks this action option. A boulder remains animated as long as the galeb duhr maintains concentration, up to 1 minute (as if concentrating on a spell).

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gargoyle fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
