monster.name: Gas Spore
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: The gas spore explodes when it drops to 0 hit points. Each creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitució saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí and become infected with a disease on a failed save. Creatures immune to the {@condition poisoned} condition are immune to this disease.

Spores invade an infected creature's system, killing the creature in a number of hours equal to {@dice 1d12} + the creature's Constitució score, unless the disease is removed. In half that time, the creature becomes {@condition poisoned} for the rest of the duration. After the creature dies, it sprouts {@dice 2d4} Tiny gas spores that grow to full size in 7 days.

trait.name: Eerie Resemblance
entries: The gas spore resembles a beholder. A creature that can see the gas spore can discern its true nature with a successful {@dc 15} Intel·ligència (Nature) check.

action.name: Tocar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}1 poison damage, and the creature must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitució saving throw or become infected with the disease described in the Death Burst trait.

monster.name: Gelatinous Cube
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Ooze Cube
entries: The cube takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the cube's Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw.
Creatures inside the cube can be seen but have total cover.

A creature within 5 feet of the cube can take an action to pull a creature or object out of the cube. Doing so requires a successful {@dc 12} Força check, and the creature making the attempt takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany d'àcid.
The cube can hold only one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures inside it at a time.

trait.name: Transparent
entries: Even when the cube is in plain sight, it takes a successful {@dc 15} Saviesa (Perception) check to spot a cube that has neither moved nor attacked. A creature that tries to enter the cube's space while unaware of the cube is surprised by the cube.

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The cube moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. Whenever the cube enters a creature's space, la criatura ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12}.
On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the cube. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

On a failed save, the cube enters the creature's space, and the creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany d'àcid and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can't breathe, is {@condition restrained}, and takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the cube's turns. When the cube moves, the engulfed creature moves with it.
An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a {@dc 12} Força check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the cube.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ghast must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the ghast's Stench for 24 hours.

trait.name: Turn Defiance
entries: The ghast and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

monster.name: Ghost
languages: tot idioma que comprenia en vida

trait.name: Visió Etèrea
entries: The ghost pot veure el Pla Etèri fins a 60 peus d'abast quan està al Pla Material (i viceversa).

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The ghost pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

action.name: Toc Pansidor
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Eterietat
entries: The ghost entra el Pla Etèri des del Pla Material (i viceversa). És visible des del Pla Material quan està al Llindar Eteri (i viceversa). Tanmateix no pot afectar ni ésser afectat per res de l'altre pla.

action.name: Albir Terrorífic
entries: Tota criatura no no-morta a 60 peus de the ghost que pugui veure'l ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli estarà {@condition frightened} durant 1 minut. Qui falli per més de 5 també envelleix {@dice 1d4 × 10} anys. Les criatures {@condition frightened} poden repetir la salvada al final de cada torn, cancel·lan l'efecte {@condition frightened} quan superin.Si un objectiu supera la salvada o se li acaba la condició, és immune a aquest ghost's Albir Terrorífic durant les properes 24 hores. The aging effect can be reversed with a  {@spell greater restoration} spell, but only within 24 hours of it occurring.

action.name: Posseïr {@recharge}
entries: One humanoid that the ghost can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Carisma saving throw or be possessed by the ghost; the ghost then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The ghost can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intel·ligència, Saviesa, Carisma, and immunity to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the ghost ends it as a bonus action, or the ghost is turned or forced out by an effect like the {@spell dispel evil and good} spell. When the possession ends, the ghost reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat. Si el dany de verí deixa a l'objectiu a 0 punts de cop, l'objectiu s'estabilitza però estarà {@condition poisoned} durant 1 hora, fins i tot després de recuperar punts de cop, i estarà {@condition paralyzed} mentre pateixi aquest {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Aberrant Ground
entries: The ground in a 10-foot radius around the mouther is doughlike difficult terrain. Each creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a {@dc 10} Força saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Gibbering
entries: The mouther babbles incoherently while it can see any creature and isn't {@condition incapacitated}. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the mouther and can hear the gibbering must succeed on a {@dc 10} Saviesa saving throw. On a failure, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a {@dice d8} to determine what it does during its turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action or bonus action and uses all its movement to move in a randomly determined direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its abast or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gibbering mouther makes one bite attack and, if it can, uses its Blinding Spittle.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany perforant. If the target is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is killed by this damage, it is absorbed into the mouther.

action.name: Blinding Spittle {@recharge 5}
entries: The mouther spits a chemical glob at a point it can see within 15 feet of it. The glob explodes in a blinding flash of light on impact. Each creature within 5 feet of the flash must succeed on a {@dc 13} Destresa saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the mouther's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The githyanki és Intel·ligència ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The githyanki makes two silver greatsword attacks.

action.name: Silver Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) de dany tallant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany psíquic. This is a magic weapon attack. On a critical hit against a target in an astral body (as with the {@spell astral projection} spell), the githyanki can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing damage.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The githyanki és Intel·ligència. Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The githyanki makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany psíquic.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The githzerai és Saviesa. Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Psychic Defense
entries: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Saviesa modifier.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The githzerai makes two unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany psíquic. This is a magic weapon attack.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The githzerai és Saviesa. Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Psychic Defense
entries: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Saviesa modifier.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The githzerai makes two unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany psíquic. This is a magic weapon attack.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The glabrezu's spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència ({@dc 16} salvació de conjur). The glabrezu pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The glabrezu té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The glabrezu fa quatre atacs: two with its pincers and two with its fists. Alternatively, it fa dos atacs with its pincers and casts one spell.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany contundent. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). The glabrezu has two pincers, each of which can grapple only un objectiu.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

variant.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A glabrezu has a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d3} {@creature vrock||vrocks}, {@dice 1d2} {@creature hezrou||hezrous}, or one glabrezu.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Coratge
entries: The gladiator has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gladiator hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gladiator makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast i 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany contundent. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The gladiator adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the gladiator must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gnoll fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 12} o take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gnoll fa dos atacs, either with its glaive or its longbow, and uses its Incite Rampage if it can.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Incite Rampage {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature the gnoll can see within 30 feet of it can use its reaction to make a melee attack if it can hear the gnoll and has the Rampage trait.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The goat has advantage on Força and Destresa saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

action.name: Envestir
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Fugida Veloç
entries: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Fugida Veloç
entries: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The goblin fa dos atacs with its scimitar. The second attack has disadvantage.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Redirigir Atac
entries: When a creature the goblin can see targets it with an attack, the goblin chooses another goblin within 5 feet of it. The two goblins swap places, and the chosen goblin becomes the target instead.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The dragon pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Fire Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales fire en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Weakening Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales gas en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a {@dc 13} Força saving throw or have disadvantage on Força-based attack rolls, Força checks, and Força saving throws for 1 minute. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the gorgon moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the gorgon can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Alè de Petrifying {@recharge 5}
entries: The gorgon exhales petrifying gas en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitució saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is {@condition petrified} until freed by the  {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the goristro moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 38 ({@damage 7d10}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Força saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: The goristro can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The goristro té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The goristro fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The goristro fa tres atacs: two with its fists and one with its hoof.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Hoof
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}45 ({@damage 7d10 + 7}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Gray Ooze
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Corrode Metal
entries: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the ooze corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the ooze is destroyed after dealing damage.
The ooze can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal in 1 round.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the ooze remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an oily pool or wet rock.

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany contundent mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany d'àcid, and if the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

variant.name: Psychic Gray Ooze
entries: A gray ooze that lives a long time can evolve to become more intelligent and develop limited psionic ability. Such occurrences are more common in gray oozes that live near psioncic creatures such as {@creature mind flayer||mind flayers}, suggesting that the ooze can sense and mimic psionic ability.
A psionic gray ooze has an intelligence score of 6 (-2), as well as the following additional action.

entries.name: Psychic Crush {@recharge 5}
entries: The ooze targets one creature that it can sense within 60 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 10}. Qui falli rep 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany psíquic; si supera, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The slaad's és Saviesa ({@dc 14} per salvar conjur). The slaad pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The slaad té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The slaad's són màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The slaad fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws or greatsword.

action.name: Bite (Slaad Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Claws (Slaad Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

variant.name: Control Gem
entries: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being {@condition charmed} while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against {@spell imprisonment}, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A {@spell wish} spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A {@spell greater restoration} spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Saviesa (Medicine) can remove the gem from an {@condition incapacitated} slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful {@dc 20} Saviesa (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany psíquic to the slaad.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The dragon pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Alè de Poison {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales poisonous gas en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The hag's és Saviesa ({@dc 12} per salvar conjur). She pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The hag pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The hag can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Saviesa (Insight) check.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The illusion ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching her would feel her rough flesh. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a {@dc 20} Intel·ligència (Investigation) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

action.name: Invisible Passage
entries: The hag magically turns {@condition invisible} until she attacks or casts a spell, or until her concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). While {@condition invisible}, she leaves no physical evidence of her passage, so she can be tracked only by magic. Any equipment she wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with her.

variant.name: Hag Covens
entries: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is usually chaos.

entries.name: Shared Spellcasting (Coven Only)
headerEntries: While all three members of a hag coven are within 30 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard's spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
footerEntries: For casting these spells, each hag is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intel·ligència as her spellcasting ability. The spell save DC is 12 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier.

entries.name: Hag Eye
entries: A hag coven can craft a magic item called a hag eye, which is made from a real eye coated in varnish and often fitted to a pendant or other wearable item. The hag eye is usually entrusted to a minion for safekeeping and transport. A hag in the coven can take an action to see what the hag eye sees if the hag eye is on the same plane of existence. A hag eye has AC 10, 1 hit point, and darkvision with a radius of 60 feet. If it is destroyed, each coven member takes {@dice 3d10} de dany psíquic and is {@condition blinded} for 24 hours.

A hag coven can have only one hag eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour, and the hags can't perform it while {@condition blinded}. During the ritual, if the hags take any action other than performing the ritual, they must start over.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The slaad's és Saviesa ({@dc 12} per salvar conjur). The slaad pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The slaad té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The slaad fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws or staff. Alternatively, it uses its Hurl Flame twice.

action.name: Bite (Slaad Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Claw (Slaad Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} a impactar, 60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc. The fire ignites flammable objects que ningú estigui portant o vestint.

variant.name: Control Gem
entries: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being {@condition charmed} while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against {@spell imprisonment}, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A {@spell wish} spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A {@spell greater restoration} spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Saviesa (Medicine) can remove the gem from an {@condition incapacitated} slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful {@dc 20} Saviesa (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany psíquic to the slaad.

monster.name: Grell

The {@condition poisoned} target is {@condition paralyzed}, and it can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

The target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). If the target is Medium or smaller, it is also {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends. While grappling the target, the grell has advantage on attack rolls against it and can 't use this attack against other targets. When the grell moves, any Medium or smaller target it is grappling moves with it.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The naga is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Saviesa ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics), and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it dies, the naga returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only a {@spell wish} spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 45 ({@damage 10d8}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Spit Poison
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 15/30 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 45 ({@damage 10d8}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The sphinx és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). It requires no material components to cast its spells. The sphinx has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Inescrutable
entries: L'esfinx és immune a efectes per a detectar pensaments i emocions, i qualsevol encanteri de divinació que rebutgi. Les tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa (Perspicàcia) tenen desavantatge.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The sphinx's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sphinx makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

legendary.name: Claw Attack

legendary.name: Teleportar (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

action.name: Destral de guerra

entries: The veteran exhales fire en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 24 ({@damage 7d6}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The harpy fa dos atacs: one with its claws and one with its club.

action.name: Urpes

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Luring Song
entries: The harpy sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the harpy that can hear the song must succeed on a {@dc 11} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the song ends. The harpy must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the harpy is {@condition incapacitated}.

While {@condition charmed} by the harpy, a target is {@condition incapacitated} and ignores the songs of other harpies. If the {@condition charmed} target is more than 5 feet away from the harpy, the target must move on its turn toward the harpy by the most direct route. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the harpy, a target can repeat the saving throw. A creature can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it.
A target that successfully saves is immune to this harpy's song for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The hawk has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 de dany tallant.

entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the hezrou must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the hezrou's stench for 24 hours.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hezrou fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A hezrou has a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 2d6} {@creature dretch||dretches} or one hezrou.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

variant.name: New Giant Options
entries: Some adult hill giants like to hurl themselves bodily at smaller foes and crush them beneath their bulk. This ability is represented by the following action option.

entries.name: Squash

Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition prone}. The grapple ends early if the giant stands up.

trait.name: Keen Sight

entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Leadership (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, the hobgoblin can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand the hobgoblin. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the hobgoblin is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hobgoblin fa tres atacs melé. Alternatively, it can make two ranged attacks with its javelins.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Leadership (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, the hobgoblin can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand the hobgoblin. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the hobgoblin is {@condition incapacitated}.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The hobgoblin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the hobgoblin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.name: Homunculus
languages: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: While the homunculus is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}1 piercing damage, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 10} o be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is instead {@condition poisoned} for 5 ({@dice 1d10}) minutes and {@condition unconscious} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The hook horror can't use its visió a cegues while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The hook horror has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin escoltar.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hook horror makes two hook attacks.

action.name: Hook
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The devil té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The devil makes three melee attacks: two with its fork and one with its tail. It can use Hurl Flame in place of any melee attack.

action.name: Fork
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitució saving throw or lose 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 12} Saviesa (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} a impactar, 150 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de foc. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The shark té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The hidra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The hidra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the hidra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the hidra takes 25 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hidra dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The hidra regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the hidra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the hidra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hidra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The hyena has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hyena's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The devil té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The devil fa tres atacs: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany contundent mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Wall of Ice {@recharge}
entries: The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 10 feet high, or it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter.

When the wall appears, each creature in its space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on, unless the creature is {@condition incapacitated}. The creature then makes a {@dc 17} Destresa saving throw. Qui falli rep 35 ({@damage 10d6}) de dany de fred; si supera, en rep la meitat.

The wall lasts for 1 minute or until the devil is {@condition incapacitated} or dies. The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to acid, cold, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage. If a section is destroyed, it leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the wall occupied. Whenever a creature finishes moving through the frigid air on a turn, willingly or otherwise, la criatura ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17}. Qui falli rep 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany de fred; si supera, en rep la meitat. The frigid air dissipates when the rest of the wall vanishes.

variant.name: Ice Devil Spear
entries: Some ice devils have the following action options.

entries.name: Multi-atac
entries: The devil fa dos atacs: one with its spear and one with its tail.

entries.name: Ice Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitució saving throw, or for 1 minute, its speed is reduced by 10 feet; it can take either an action or a bonus action on each of its turns, not both; and it can't take reactions. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Dia)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell fog cloud}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Carisma.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of jagged ice. Each creature within 5 feet of it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 10}. Qui falli rep 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany tallant; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary shard of ice.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany tallant mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Frost Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of cold air. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a {@dc 10} Destresa saving throw. Qui falli rep 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany de fred; si supera, en rep la meitat.

variant.name: Summon Mephits (1/Dia)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The imp can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a rat (speed 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., climb 20 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the imp's darkvision.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The imp té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Sting (Bite in Beast Form)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The imp magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the imp wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

variant.name: Imp Familiar
entries: Imps can be found in the service to mortal spellcasters, acting as advisors, spies, and familiars. An imp urges its master to acts of evil, knowing the mortal's soul is a prize the imp might ultimately claim. Imps display an unusual loyalty to their masters, and an imp can be quite dangerous if its master is threatened. Some such imps have the following trait.

entries.name: Familiar
entries: The imp can enter into a contract to serve another creature as a familiar, forming a telepathic bond with its willing master. While the two are bonded, the master can sense what the imp senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the imp is within 10 feet of its master, the master shares the imp's Magic Resistance trait. If its master violates the terms of the contract, the imp can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: The fiend ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature it has {@condition charmed}. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Without wings, the fiend loses its flying speed. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

action.name: Claw (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Charm
entries: One humanoid the fiend can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Saviesa saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the fiend's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours.
The fiend can have only un objectiu {@condition charmed} at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

action.name: Draining Kiss
entries: The fiend kisses a creature {@condition charmed} by it or a willing creature. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} against this magic, taking 32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) de dany psíquic on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Eterietat
entries: The fiend magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

monster.name: Intellect Devourer
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: Detectar Consciència
entries: The intellect devourer pot sentir i localitzar qualsevol criatura a 300 peus d'abast amb una Intel·ligència de 3 o major. Cap barrera s'interposa excepte la protecció del conjur {@spell mind blank}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The intellect devourer makes one attack with its claws and uses Devour Intellect.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Devour Intellect
entries: The intellect devourer targets one creature it can see within 10 feet of it that has a brain. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Intel·ligència saving throw against this magic or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany psíquic. Also on a failure, roll {@dice 3d6}: If the total equals or exceeds the target's Intel·ligència score, that score is reduced to 0. The target is {@condition stunned} until it regains at least one point of Intel·ligència.

action.name: Body Thief
entries: The intellect devourer initiates an Intel·ligència contest with an {@condition incapacitated} humanoid within 5 feet of it that isn't protected by {@spell protection from evil and good}. If it wins the contest, the intellect devourer magically consumes the target's brain, teleports into the target's skull, and takes control of the target's body. While inside a creature, the intellect devourer has total cover against attacks and other effects originating outside its host. The intellect devourer retains its Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma scores, as well as its understanding of Deep Speech, its telepathy, and its traits. It otherwise adopts the target's statistics. It knows everything the creature knew, including spells and languages.

If the host body dies, the intellect devourer must leave it. A {@spell protection from evil and good} spell cast on the body drives the intellect devourer out. The intellect devourer is also forced out if the target regains its devoured brain by means of a {@spell wish}. By spending 5 feet of its movement, the intellect devourer can voluntarily leave the body, teleporting to the nearest unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. The body then dies, unless its brain is restored within 1 round.

monster.name: Invisible Stalker
languages: understands Common but doesn't speak it

trait.name: Invisibility
entries: The stalker is {@condition invisible}.

trait.name: Faultless Tracker
entries: The stalker is given a quarry by its summoner. The stalker knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The stalker also knows the location of its summoner.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The stalker makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

monster.name: Iron Golem

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

languages: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Fire Absorption
entries: Whenever the golem is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The golem té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The golem's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The golem fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Espasa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Alè de Poison {@recharge 5}
entries: The golem exhales poisonous gas en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 19}. Qui falli rep 45 ({@damage 10d8}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The jackal has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin escoltar or smell.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The jackal has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the jackal's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) de dany perforant.

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The jackalwere can use its action to polymorph into a specific Medium human or a jackal-humanoid hybrid, or back into its true form (that of a Small jackal). Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The jackalwere has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin escoltar or smell.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The jackalwere has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite (Jackal or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Scimitar (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Sleep Gaze
entries: The jackalwere gazes at one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 10}. On a failed save, the target succumbs to a magical slumber, falling {@condition unconscious} for 10 minutes or until someone uses an action to shake the target awake. A creature that successfully saves against the effect is immune to this jackalwere's gaze for the next 24 hours. Undead and creatures immune to being {@condition charmed} aren't affected by it.

monster.name: Kenku
languages: understands Auran and Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the kenku has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The kenku can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Saviesa (Insight) check.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The whale can't use its visió a cegues while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The whale pot aguantar la respiració durant 30 minuts

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The whale has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin escoltar.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Coratge
entries: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The knight fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Leadership (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, the knight can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand the knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the knight is {@condition incapacitated}.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Fona
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The kraken pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: The kraken ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The kraken fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kraken makes three tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Large or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes 42 ({@damage 12d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the kraken's turns. If the kraken takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken must succeed on a {@dc 25} Constitució saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 30 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 18} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple un objectiu.

action.name: Fling
entries: One Large or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Destresa saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Lightning Storm
entries: The kraken magically creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target the kraken can see within 120 feet of it. A target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 23}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany elèctric; si supera, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Tentacle Attack or Fling
entries: The kraken makes one tentacle attack or uses its Fling.

legendary.name: Lightning Storm (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The kraken uses Lightning Storm.

legendary.name: Ink Cloud (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 60-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken. Each creature other than the kraken that ends its turn there must succeed on a {@dc 23} Constitució saving throw. Qui falli rep 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kraken's next turn.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The kuo-toa pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is {@condition invisible} or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Net
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5/15 peus d'abast, one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained}. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 10} Força check to free itself or another creature in a net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

reaction.name: Sticky Shield
entries: When a creature misses the kuo-toa with a melee weapon attack, the kuo-toa uses its sticky shield to catch the weapon. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 11} Força saving throw, or the weapon becomes stuck to the kuo-toa's shield. If the weapon's wielder can't or won't let go of the weapon, the wielder is {@condition grappled} while the weapon is stuck. While stuck, the weapon can't be used. A creature can pull the weapon free by taking an action to make a {@dc 11} Força check and succeeding.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The kuo-toa is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Saviesa ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The kuo-toa pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is {@condition invisible} or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kuo-toa fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Scepter
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany elèctric.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The kuo-toa pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is {@condition invisible} or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: The kuo-toa adds its Saviesa modifier to its armor class.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kuo-toa makes one bite attack and two unarmed strikes.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany elèctric, and the target can't take reactions until the end of the kuo-toa's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The kuo-toa is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Saviesa ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The kuo-toa pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is {@condition invisible} or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kuo-toa fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its pincer staff.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Pincer Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the kuo-toa can't use its pincer staff on another target.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The lamia's és Saviesa ({@dc 13} per salvar conjur). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The lamia fa dos atacs: one with its claws and one with its dagger or Intoxicating Touch.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Intoxicating Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}The target is magically cursed for 1 hour. Until the curse ends, the target has disadvantage on Saviesa saving throws and all ability checks.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the lemure's darkvision.

trait.name: Hellish Rejuvenation
entries: A lemure that dies in the Nine Hells comes back to life with all its hit points in {@dice 1d10} days unless it is killed by a good-aligned creature with a bless spell cast on that creature or its remains are sprinkled with holy water.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany contundent

monster.name: Lich
languages: Common plus up to five other languages

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The lich is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència ({@dc 20} salvada de conjur, {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The lich has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the lich falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

trait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: The lich té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

action.name: Paralyzing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The lich casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Paralyzing Touch (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The lich uses its Paralyzing Touch.

legendary.name: Frightening Gaze (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The lich fixes its gaze on one creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Saviesa saving throw against this magic or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. L'objectiu {@condition frightened} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the lich's gaze for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Disrupt Life (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Each non-undead creature within 20 feet of the lich ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18} against this magic. Qui falli rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany necròtic; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The lion has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: Si el lion es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Urpa, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 13}. Si falla, està {@condition prone}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition prone}, el lion pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can long jump up to 25 feet.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The lizardfolk pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

trait.name: Skewer
entries: Once per turn, when the lizardfolk makes a melee attack with its trident and hits, the target takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage, and the lizardfolk gains temporary hit points equal to the extra damage dealt.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The lizardfolk fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws or trident or two melee attacks with its trident.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The lizardfolk pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

trait.name: Skewer
entries: Once per turn, when the lizardfolk makes a melee attack with its trident and hits, the target takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage, and the lizardfolk gains temporary hit points equal to the extra damage dealt.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The lizardfolk fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws or trident or two melee attacks with its trident.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The lizardfolk pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The lizardfolk makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Heavy Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Spiked Shield
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Lizardfolk Form Only)
