headerEntries: The lizardfolk és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The lizardfolk has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The lizardfolk pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

action.name: Multiattack (Lizardfolk Form Only)
entries: The lizardfolk fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant in {@creature crocodile} form. If the lizardfolk is in crocodile form and the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the lizardfolk can't bite another target. If the lizardfolk reverts to its true form, the grapple ends.

action.name: Claws (Lizardfolk Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Change Shape (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The lizardfolk magically polymorphs into a {@creature crocodile}, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The mage és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

variant.name: Familiars
entries: Any spellcaster that can cast the {@spell find familiar} spell (such as an archmage or mage) is likely to have a familiar. The familiar can be one of the creatures described in the spell (see the Player's Handbook) or some other Tiny monster, such as a {@creature ma reptadora}, {@creature imp}, {@creature pseudodragon}, or {@creature quasit}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Dia)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell heat metal} ({@dc 10} salvació de conjur), requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Carisma.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of lava. Each creature within 5 feet of it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary mound of magma.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany tallant mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of fire. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat.

variant.name: Summon Mephits (1/Dia)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the magmin dies, it explodes in a burst of fire and magma. Each creature within 10 feet of it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat. Flammable objects que ningú estigui portant o vestint in that area are ignited.

trait.name: Ignited Illumination
entries: As a bonus action, the magmin can set itself ablaze or extinguish its flames. While ablaze, the magmin sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Tocar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc at the end of each of its turns.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: Si el mamut es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Tossada, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 18}. Si falla, està {@condition prone}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition prone}, el mamut pot fer un atac Esclafar com a acció bonus.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Esclafar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura {@condition prone} . {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Tail Spike Regrowth
entries: The mantícora has twenty-four tail spikes. Used spikes regrow when the mantícora finishes a long rest.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The mantícora fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws or three with its tail spikes.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Tail Spike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 100/200 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The marid és Carisma ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The marid pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the marid dies, its body disintegrates into a burst of water and foam, leaving behind only equipment the marid was wearing or carrying.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The marid makes two trident attacks.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) de dany perforant, o 15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Water Jet
entries: The marid magically shoots water in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 16}. On a failure, a target takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany contundent and, if it is Huge or smaller, is pushed up to 20 feet away from the marid and knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, a target takes half the dany contundent, but is neither pushed nor knocked {@condition prone}.

variant.name: Genie Powers
entries: Genies have a variety of magical capabilities, including spells. A few have even greater powers that allow them to alter their appearance or the nature of reality.

entries.name: Disguises
entries: Some genies can veil themselves in illusion to pass as other similarly shaped creatures. Such genies can innately cast the {@spell disguise self} spell at will, often with a longer duration than is normal for that spell. Mightier genies can cast the {@spell true polymorph} spell one to three times per day, possibly with a longer duration than normal. Such genies can change only their own shape, but a rare few can use the spell on other creatures and objects as well.

entries.name: Wishes
entries: The genie power to grant wishes is legendary among mortals. Only the most potent genies, such as those among the nobility, can do so. A particular genie that has this power can grant one to three wishes to a creature that isn't a genie. Once a genie has granted its limit of wishes, it can't grant wishes again for some amount of time (usually 1 year), and cosmic law dictates that the same genie can expend its limit of wishes on a specific creature only once in that creature's existence.

To be granted a wish, a creature within 60 feet of the genie states a desired effect to it. The genie can then cast the {@spell wish} spell on the creature's behalf to bring about the effect. Depending on the genie's nature, the genie might try to pervert the intent of the wish by exploiting the wish's poor wording. The perversion of the wording is usually crafted to be to the genie's benefit.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The marilith té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The marilith's són màgics.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The marilith can take one reaction on every turn in combat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The marilith can make seven attacks: six with its longswords and one with its tail.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany contundent. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, the marilith can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the marilith can't make atac de cuas against other targets.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The marilith magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The marilith adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the marilith must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

variant.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.

A marilith has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d6} {@creature vrock||vrocks}, {@dice 1d4} {@creature hezrou||hezrous}, {@dice 1d3} {@creature glabrezu||glabrezus}, {@dice 1d2} {@creature nalfeshnee||nalfeshnees}, or one marilith.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The mastiff has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin escoltar or smell.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Mirada Petrificant
entries: Si una criatura que pugui veure la medusa comença el torn a 30 peus seus, la medusa pot forçar-la a salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14}. Per poder fer-ho, la medusa no pot estar {@condition incapacitated} i ha de poder veure la criatura. Si la criatura falla per més de 5, es {@condition petrified} immediatament. Si falla per menys es comença a tornar de pedra i està {@condition restrained}. La criatura {@condition restrained} ha de repetir la salvada a l'inici del seu proper torn. Si falla, estarà {@condition petrified}. Si supera, l'efecte es cancel·la. La petrificació continuarà fins que un efecte màgic com ara {@spell greater restoration} la cancel·li.

Una criatura no sorpresa pot desviar la mirada per evitar la salvada al principi del seu torn. Si ho fa, no veurà la medusa fins el principi del seu proper torn (on pot tornar a desviar la mirada). Si en algun moment la criatura mira a la medusa, ha de salvar immediatament.
Si la medusa es veu el reflexe a una superfície polida a 30 metres d'abast en una àrea de llum forta es veurà afectada per la seva pròpia maledicció.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The medusa makes either three melee attacks—one with its snake hair and two with its shortsword—or two ranged attacks with its longbow.

action.name: Snake Hair
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de verí.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The merfolk pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant, o 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The merrow pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The merrow fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws or harpoon.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Harpoon
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Força contest against the merrow or be pulled up to 20 feet toward the merrow.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The mezzoloth's és Saviesa ({@dc 11} per salvar conjur). The mezzoloth pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The mezzoloth té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The mezzoloth's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The mezzoloth fa dos atacs: one with its claws and one with its trident.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant when held with two claws and used to make a melee attack.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The mezzoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

variant.name: Yugoloth Summoning
entries: Some yugoloths have an action option that allows them to summon other yugoloths.

entries.name: Summon Yugoloth (1/Dia)
entries: The yugoloth attempts a magical summoning.
A mezzoloth has a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of summoning one mezzoloth.

A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, does as it pleases, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
entries: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also {@condition grappled} by it (escape {@dc 13}). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany d'àcid.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The mind flayer és Intel·ligència ({@dc 15} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The mind flayer té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany psíquic. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intel·ligència saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the mind flayer. {@h}The target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany perforant. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Explosió Mental {@recharge 5}
entries: The mind flayer emet energia psíquica màgicament en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Intel·ligència de {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany psíquic i està {@condition stunned} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The mind flayer és Intel·ligència ({@dc 15} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The mind flayer is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència (save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The mind flayer has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The mind flayer té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany psíquic. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intel·ligència saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the mind flayer. {@h}The target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany perforant. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Explosió Mental {@recharge 5}
entries: The mind flayer emet energia psíquica màgicament en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Intel·ligència de {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany psíquic i està {@condition stunned} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the minotaur moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Força saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the minotaur can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the skeleton moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Força saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Ideologia Axiomàtica
entries: The monodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Desintegració
entries: If the monodrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant.

variant.name: Rogue Modrons
entries: A modron unit sometimes becomes defective, either through natural decay or exposure to chaotic forces. Rogue modrons don't act in accordance with Primus's wishes and directives, breaking laws, disobeying orders, and even engaging in violence. Other modrons hunt down such rogues.
A rogue modron loses the Axiomatic Mind trait and can have any alignment other than lawful neutral. Otherwise, it has the same statistics as a regular modron of its rank.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of sticky mud. Each Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Destresa saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary mound of mud.

action.name: Fists
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Mud Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit belches viscid mud onto one creature within 5 feet of it. If the target is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Destresa saving throw or be {@condition restrained} for 1 minute. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

variant.name: Summon Mephits (1/Dia)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The mule is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The mule has advantage on Força and Destresa saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

monster.name: Mòmia
languages: the languages it knew in life

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.

action.name: Rotting Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitució saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the {@spell remove curse} spell or other magic.

action.name: Dreadful Glare
entries: The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Saviesa saving throw against this magic or become {@condition frightened} until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition paralyzed} for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not senyors de les mòmies) for the next 24 hours.

monster.name: Senyor de les Mòmies
languages: the languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The senyor de les mòmies is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Saviesa ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The senyor de les mòmies has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The senyor de les mòmies té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: A destroyed senyor de les mòmies gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the senyor de les mòmies's heart.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.

action.name: Rotting Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany necròtic. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitució saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the {@spell remove curse} spell or other magic.

action.name: Dreadful Glare
entries: The senyor de les mòmies targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the senyor de les mòmies, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Saviesa saving throw against this magic or become {@condition frightened} until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition paralyzed} for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies and senyors de les mòmies for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The senyor de les mòmies makes one attack with its rotting fist or uses its Dreadful Glare.

legendary.name: Blinding Dust
entries: Blinding dust and sand swirls magically around the senyor de les mòmies. Each creature within 5 feet of the senyor de les mòmies must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the creature's next turn.

legendary.name: Blasphemous Word (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The senyor de les mòmies utters a blasphemous word. Each non-undead creature within 10 feet of the senyor de les mòmies that can hear the magical utterance must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the senyor de les mòmies's next turn.

legendary.name: Channel Negative Energy (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The senyor de les mòmies magically unleashes negative energy. Creatures within 60 feet of the senyor de les mòmies, including ones behind barriers and around corners, can't regain hit points until the end of the senyor de les mòmies's next turn.

legendary.name: Whirlwind of Sand (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The senyor de les mòmies magically transforms into a whirlwind of sand, moves up to 60 feet, and reverts to its normal form. While in whirlwind form, the senyor de les mòmies is immune to all damage, and it can't be {@condition grappled}, {@condition petrified}, knocked {@condition prone}, {@condition restrained}, or {@condition stunned}. Equipment worn or carried by the senyor de les mòmies remain in its possession.

trait.name: Distress Spores
entries: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

trait.name: Sun Sickness
entries: While in sunlight, the myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany contundent mes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Pacifying Spores (3/Dia)
entries: The myconid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Rapport Spores
entries: A 20-foot radius of spores extends from the myconid. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an Intel·ligència of 2 or higher that aren't undead, constructs, or elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.

variant.name: Zuggtomoy's Empowerment
entries: Myconids that embrace {@creature Zuggtmoy|MTF} can develop new, more destructive kinds of spores. Myconid adults can have two of the following spore effects.

entries.name: Caustic Spores (1/Dia)
entries: The myconid releases spores en un con de 30 peus. Each creature inside the cone must succeed on a {@dc 11} Destresa saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the myconid's turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success. The save DC is 8 + the myconid's Constitució modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Infestation Spores (1/Dia)
entries: The myconid releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on it, and the cloud lingers for 1 minute. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11}. The save DC is 8 + the myconid's Constitució modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy) and also gains a random form of indefinite madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of {@creature Zuggtmoy|MTF} table) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a humanoid or a Large or smaller beast.

entries.name: Euphoria Spores (1/Dia)
entries: The myconid releases a cloud of spores in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Other creatures in that area must each succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitució saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The save DC is 8 + the myconid's Constitució modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect early on itself on a success. When the effect ends on it, the creature gains one level of {@condition exhaustion}.

trait.name: Distress Spores
entries: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

trait.name: Sun Sickness
entries: While in sunlight, the myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The myconid uses either its Hallucination Spores or its Pacifying Spores, then makes a fist attack.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 3d4 + 1}) de dany contundent mes 7 ({@damage 3d4}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Animating Spores (3/Dia)
entries: The myconid targets one corpse of a humanoid or a Large or smaller beast within 5 feet of it and releases spores at the corpse. In 24 hours, the corpse rises as a spore servant. The corpse stays animated for {@dice 1d4 + 1} weeks or until destroyed, and it can't be animated again in this way.

action.name: Hallucination Spores
entries: The myconid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The {@condition poisoned} target is {@condition incapacitated} while it hallucinates. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Pacifying Spores
entries: The myconid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Rapport Spores
entries: A 30-foot radius of spores extends from the myconid. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an Intel·ligència of 2 or higher that aren't undead, constructs, or elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.

variant.name: Zuggtomoy's Empowerment
entries: Myconids that embrace {@creature Zuggtmoy|MTF} can develop new, more destructive kinds of spores. Myconid sovereigns have all these spore effects.

entries.name: Caustic Spores (1/Dia)
entries: The myconid releases spores en un con de 30 peus. Each creature inside the cone must succeed on a {@dc 12} Destresa saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the myconid's turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success. The save DC is 8 + the myconid's Constitució modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Infestation Spores (1/Dia)
entries: The myconid releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on it, and the cloud lingers for 1 minute. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12}. The save DC is 8 + the myconid's Constitució modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy) and also gains a random form of indefinite madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of {@creature Zuggtmoy|MTF} table) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a humanoid or a Large or smaller beast.

entries.name: Euphoria Spores (1/Dia)
entries: The myconid releases a cloud of spores in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Other creatures in that area must each succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitució saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The save DC is 8 + the myconid's Constitució modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect early on itself on a success. When the effect ends on it, the creature gains one level of {@condition exhaustion}.

trait.name: Distress Spores
entries: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

trait.name: Sun Sickness
entries: While in sunlight, the myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) de dany contundent mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Rapport Spores (3/Dia)
entries: A 10-foot radius of spores extends from the myconid. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an Intel·ligència of 2 or higher that aren't undead, constructs, or elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The nalfeshnee té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The nalfeshnee uses Horror Nimbus if it can. It then fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Horror Nimbus {@recharge 5}
entries: The nalfeshnee magically emits scintillating, multicolored light. Each creature within 15 feet of the nalfeshnee that can see the light must succeed on a {@dc 15} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a nalfeshnee's Horror Nimbus durant les properes 24 hores.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The nalfeshnee magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

variant.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.

A nalfeshnee has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} {@creature vrock||vrocks}, {@dice 1d3} {@creature hezrou||hezrous}, {@dice 1d2} {@creature glabrezu||glabrezus}, or one nalfeshnee.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

monster.name: Needle Blight
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Needles
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 30/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1}) de dany perforant.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The hag és Carisma ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). She pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The hag té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Night Hag Items
entries: A night hag carries two very rare magic items that she must craft for herself. If either object is lost, the night hag will go to great lengths to retrieve it, as creating a new tool takes time and effort.
Heartstone: This lustrous black gem allows a night hag to become ethereal while it is in her possession. The touch of a heartstone also cures any disease. Crafting a heartstone takes 30 days.

Soul Bag: When an evil humanoid dies as a result of a night hag's Nightmare Haunting, the hag catches the soul in this black sack made of stitched flesh. A soul bag can hold only one evil soul at a time, and only the night hag who crafted the bag can catch a soul with it. Crafting a soul bag takes 7 days and a humanoid sacrifice (whose flesh is used to make the bag).

action.name: Claws (Hag Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The hag magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium female humanoid, or back into her true form. Her statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. She reverts to her true form if she dies.

action.name: Eterietat
entries: The hag magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. To do so, the hag must have a heartstone in her possession.

action.name: Nightmare Haunting (1/Dia)
entries: While on the Ethereal Plane, the hag magically touches a sleeping humanoid on the Material Plane. A {@spell protection from evil and good} spell cast on the target prevents this contact, as does a magic circle. As long as the contact persists, the target has dreadful visions. If these visions last for at least 1 hour, the target gains no benefit from its rest, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). If this effect reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and if the target was evil, its soul is trapped in the hag's soul bag. The reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until removed by the  {@spell greater restoration} spell or similar magic.

variant.name: Hag Covens
entries: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is usually chaos.

entries.name: Shared Spellcasting (Coven Only)
headerEntries: While all three members of a hag coven are within 30 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard's spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
footerEntries: For casting these spells, each hag is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intel·ligència as her spellcasting ability. The spell save DC is 12 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier.

entries.name: Hag Eye
entries: A hag coven can craft a magic item called a hag eye, which is made from a real eye coated in varnish and often fitted to a pendant or other wearable item. The hag eye is usually entrusted to a minion for safekeeping and transport. A hag in the coven can take an action to see what the hag eye sees if the hag eye is on the same plane of existence. A hag eye has AC 10, 1 hit point, and darkvision with a radius of 60 feet. If it is destroyed, each coven member takes {@dice 3d10} de dany psíquic and is {@condition blinded} for 24 hours.

A hag coven can have only one hag eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour, and the hags can't perform it while {@condition blinded}. During the ritual, if the hags take any action other than performing the ritual, they must start over.

monster.name: Nightmare
languages: understands Abyssal, Common, and Infernal but can't speak

trait.name: Confer Fire Resistance
entries: The nightmare can grant resistance to fire damage to anyone riding it.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The nightmare sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Ethereal Stride
entries: The nightmare and up to three willing creatures within 5 feet of it magically enter the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The noble adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the noble must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The nothic has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The nothic makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Rotting Gaze
entries: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitució saving throw against this magic or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Weird Insight
entries: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must contest its Carisma (Deception) check against the nothic's Saviesa (Insight) check. If the nothic wins, it magically learns one fact or secret about the target. The target automatically wins if it is immune to being {@condition charmed}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The nycaloth és Carisma. The nycaloth pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The nycaloth té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The nycaloth's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The nycaloth makes two melee attacks, or it makes one melee attack and teleports before or after the attack.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitució saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany tallant at the start of each of its turns due to a fiendish wound. Each time the nycaloth hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 2d4}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 13} Saviesa (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The nycaloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

variant.name: Yugoloth Summoning
entries: Some yugoloths have an action option that allows them to summon other yugoloths.

entries.name: Summon Yugoloth (1/Dia)
entries: The yugoloth chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A nycaloth has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} {@creature mezzoloth||mezzoloths} or one nycaloth.

A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, does as it pleases, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.

monster.name: Ochre Jelly
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The jelly pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany contundent mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany d'àcid.

reaction.name: Split
entries: When a jelly that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new jellies if it has at least 10 hit points. Each new jelly has hit points equal to half the original jelly's, rounded down. New jellies are one size smaller than the original jelly.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

trait.name: Underwater Camouflage
entries: The octopus has advantage on Destresa ({@skill Stealth}) checks made while underwater.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 10} per escapar). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

action.name: Ink Cloud (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Ogre Zombie
languages: understands Common and Giant but can't speak

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The oni's és Saviesa ({@dc 13} per salvar conjur). The oni pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The oni's són màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The oni regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The oni fa dos atacs, either with its claws or its glaive.

action.name: Claw (Oni Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant in Small or Medium form.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The oni magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium humanoid, into a Large giant, or back into its true form. Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. The only equipment that is transformed is its glaive, which shrinks so that it can be wielded in humanoid form. If the oni dies, it reverts to its true form, and its glaive reverts to its normal size.

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The orc és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 3. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The orc has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Gruumsh's Fury
entries: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@dice 1d8}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@dice 1d6 + 3} plus {@dice 1d8}) de dany perforant, o 12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Gruumsh's Fury
entries: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@dice 1d8}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The orc fa dos atacs with its greataxe or its spear.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 1d12 + 4} plus {@damage 1d8}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d6 + 4} plus {@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant, o 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Battle Cry (1/Dia)
entries: Each creature of the war chief's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Battle Cry gain advantage on attack rolls until the start of the war chief's next turn. The war chief can then make one attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: As a bonus action, the orog can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The orog makes two greataxe attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 feet of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The otyugh fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its tentacles.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitució saving throw against disease or become {@condition poisoned} until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) on a failure. The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. Aquesta reducció de punts de cop màxims dura fins que the disease is cured.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The otyugh has two tentacles, each of which can grapple un objectiu.

action.name: Batre Tencacle
entries: The otyugh slams creatures {@condition grappled} by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitució saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the otyugh's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the dany contundent and isn't {@condition stunned}.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The owl no provoca atacs d'oportunitats quan surt volant de l'abast d'un enemic

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The owl has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin escoltar or sight.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 de dany tallant.

trait.name: Oída i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The owlbear has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista or smell.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The owlbear fa dos atacs: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The panther has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: Si el panther es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Urpa, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 12}. Si falla, està {@condition prone}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition prone}, el panther pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Ideologia Axiomàtica
entries: The pentadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Desintegració
entries: If the pentadrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The pentadrone makes five arm attacks.

action.name: Arm
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Paralysis Gas {@recharge 5}
entries: The pentadrone exhales a 30-foot cone of gas. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

variant.name: Rogue Modrons
entries: A modron unit sometimes becomes defective, either through natural decay or exposure to chaotic forces. Rogue modrons don't act in accordance with Primus's wishes and directives, breaking laws, disobeying orders, and even engaging in violence. Other modrons hunt down such rogues.
A rogue modron loses the Axiomatic Mind trait and can have any alignment other than lawful neutral. Otherwise, it has the same statistics as a regular modron of its rank.

monster.name: Peryton
languages: understands Common and Elvish but can't speak

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the peryton is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The peryton doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Oída i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The peryton has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista or smell.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The peryton makes one gore attack and one talon attack.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Ethereal Jaunt
entries: As a bonus action, the spider can magically shift from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The spider pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat. Si el dany de verí deixa a l'objectiu a 0 punts de cop, l'objectiu s'estabilitza però estarà {@condition poisoned} durant 1 hora, fins i tot després de recuperar punts de cop, i estarà {@condition paralyzed} mentre pateixi aquest {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the piercer remains motionless on the ceiling, it is indistinguishable from a normal stalactite.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The piercer pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Drop
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, one creature directly underneath the piercer. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant per 10 feet fallen, up to 21 ({@dice 6d6}). Miss: The piercer takes half the normal falling damage for the distance fallen.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The pit fiend's spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 21} salvació de conjur). The pit fiend pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: Any creature hostile to the pit fiend that starts its turn within 20 feet of the pit fiend ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 21}, unless the pit fiend is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the pit fiend's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The pit fiend té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The pit fiend's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The pit fiend fa quatre atacs: one with its bite, one with its claw, one with its mace, and one with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) de dany perforant. The target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitució saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target can't regain hit points, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de verí at the start of each of its turns. L'objectiu {@condition poisoned} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Maça
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) de dany contundent mes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The pixie és Carisma ({@dc 12} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament requiring only its pixie dust as a component

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The pixie té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Superior Invisibility
entries: The pixie magically turns {@condition invisible} until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the pixie wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The planetar's spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 20} salvació de conjur). The planetar pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Armes Angelicals
entries: Els atacs armats de The planetar's són màgics. Quan the planetar impacta amb qualsevol arma, fa {@dice 5d8} de dany radiant extra (inclòs a l'atac).

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The planetar knows if it hears a lie.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The planetar té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The planetar fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) de dany tallant mes 22 ({@damage 5d8}) de dany radiant.

action.name: Toc Curatiu (4/Dia)
entries: The planetar touches another creature. The target magically regains 30 ({@dice 6d8 + 3}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The pleiosaure can hold its breath for 1 hour.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10}. Qui falli rep 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The bear has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The bear fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: Poltergeist
languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The poltergeist pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the poltergeist has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Invisibility
entries: The poltergeist is {@condition invisible}.

action.name: Forceful Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de força.

action.name: Telekinetic Thrust
entries: The poltergeist targets a creature or unattended object within 30 feet of it. A creature must be Medium or smaller to be affected by this magic, and an object can weigh up to 150 pounds.

If the target is a creature, the poltergeist makes a Carisma check contested by the target's Força check. If the poltergeist wins the contest, the poltergeist hurls the target up to 30 feet in any direction, including upward. If the target then comes into contact with a hard surface or heavy object, the target takes {@dice 1d6} damage per 10 feet moved.

If the target is an object that isn't being worn or carried, the poltergeist hurls it up to 30 feet in any direction. The poltergeist can use the object as a ranged weapon, attacking one creature along the object's path ({@hit 4} a impactar) and dealing 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany contundent on a hit.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The priest és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The priest has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Divine Eminence
entries: As a bonus action, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany radiant to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

action.name: Maça
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent.

monster.name: Pseudodragon
languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

trait.name: Sentits Aguts
entries: The pseudodragon has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista, hearing, or smell.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The pseudodragon té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Fiblar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 11} o become {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls {@condition unconscious} for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature uses an action to shake it awake.

variant.name: Pseudodragon Familiar
entries: Some pseudodragons are willing to serve spellcasters as a familiar. Such pseudodragons have the following trait.

entries.name: Familiar
entries: The pseudodragon can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a magic, telepathic bond with that willing companion. While the two are bonded, the companion can sense what the pseudodragon senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the pseudodragon is within 10 feet of its companion, the companion shares the pseudodragon's Magic Resistance trait. At any time and for any reason, the pseudodragon can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The pteranòdon no provoca atacs d'oportunitats quan surt volant de l'abast d'un enemic

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany perforant

trait.name: Tuneladora
entries: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The worm fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its stinger.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Destresa saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the worm's turns.

If the worm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitució saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the worm. If the worm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tail Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 19}. Qui falli rep 42 ({@damage 12d6}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Ideologia Axiomàtica
entries: The quadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Desintegració
entries: If the quadrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The quadrone makes two fist attacks or four shortbow attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

variant.name: Rogue Modrons
entries: A modron unit sometimes becomes defective, either through natural decay or exposure to chaotic forces. Rogue modrons don't act in accordance with Primus's wishes and directives, breaking laws, disobeying orders, and even engaging in violence. Other modrons hunt down such rogues.
A rogue modron loses the Axiomatic Mind trait and can have any alignment other than lawful neutral. Otherwise, it has the same statistics as a regular modron of its rank.

trait.name: Wounded Fury
entries: While it has 10 hit points or fewer, the quaggoth has advantage on attack rolls. In addition, it deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to any target it hits with a melee attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The quaggoth makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: Quaggoth Spore Servant
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The spore servant makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The quaggoth és Saviesa ({@dc 11} per salvar conjur). The quaggoth pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Wounded Fury
entries: While it has 10 hit points or fewer, the quaggoth has advantage on attack rolls. In addition, it deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to any target it hits with a melee attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The quaggoth makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The quasit can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a bat (speed 10 feet fly 40 ft.), a centipede (40 ft., climb 40 ft.), or a toad (40 ft., swim 40 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The quasit té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Claw (Bite in Beast Form)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 10} o take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany de verí and become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Scare (1/Dia)
entries: One creature of the quasit's choice within 20 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the quasit is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The quasit magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks or uses Scare, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the quasit wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

variant.name: Quasit Familiar
entries: Mortal spellcasters interested in extraplanar familiars find quasits easy to summon and eager to serve. The quasit plays the part of the obsequious servant. It serves its master well, but it goads the mortal to greater and greater acts of chaos and evil. Such quasits have the following trait.

entries.name: Familiar
entries: The quasit can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a telepathic bond with its willing master. While the two are bonded, the master can sense what the quasit senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the quasit is within 10 feet of its master, the master shares the quasit's Magic Resistance trait. At any time and for any reason, the quasit can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The quipper té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The quipper can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage.

vulnerable.note: from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The rakshasa és Carisma ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The rakshasa pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
