entries: The rakshasa can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The rakshasa makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany tallant, and the target is cursed if it is a creature. The magical curse takes effect whenever the target takes a short or long rest, filling the target's thoughts with horrible images and dreams. The cursed target gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest. The curse lasts until it is lifted by a {@spell remove curse} spell or similar magic.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The rat has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 10} Saviesa (Insight) check.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Alè de Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 24 ({@damage 7d6}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The slaad té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The slaad fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitució saving throw or be infected with a disease—a minuscule slaad egg.

A humanoid host can carry only one slaad egg to term at a time. Over three months, the egg moves to the chest cavity, gestates, and forms a slaad tadpole. In the 24-hour period before giving birth, the host starts to feel unwell, its speed is halved, and it has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. At birth, the tadpole chews its way through vital organs and out of the host's chest in 1 round, killing the host in the process.
If the disease is cured before the tadpole's emergence, the unborn slaad is disintegrated.

variant.name: Control Gem
entries: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being {@condition charmed} while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against {@spell imprisonment}, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A {@spell wish} spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A {@spell greater restoration} spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Saviesa (Medicine) can remove the gem from an {@condition incapacitated} slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful {@dc 20} Saviesa (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany psíquic to the slaad.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The shark has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the remorhaz or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}40 ({@damage 6d10 + 7}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the remorhaz can't bite another target.

action.name: Empassar
entries: The remorhaz makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the remorhaz, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the remorhaz's turns.

If the remorhaz takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the remorhaz must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitució saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet oft he remorhaz. If the remorhaz dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

monster.name: Revenant
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The revenant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the revenant takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the revenant's next turn. The revenant's body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When the revenant's body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another humanoid corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a {@spell wish} spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.name: Immunitat a l'Expulsió
entries: The revenant is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Vengeful Tracker
entries: The revenant knows the distance to and direction of any creature against which it seeks revenge, even if the creature and the revenant are on different planes of existence. If the creature being tracked by the revenant dies, the revenant knows.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The revenant makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature against which the revenant has sworn vengeance, the target takes an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany contundent. Instead of dealing damage, the revenant can grapple the target (escape {@dc 14}) provided the target is Large or smaller.

action.name: Vengeful Glare
entries: The revenant targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it and against which it has sworn vengeance. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15}. On a failure, the target is {@condition paralyzed} until the revenant deals damage to it, or until the end of the revenant's next turn. When the paralysis ends, the target is {@condition frightened} of the revenant for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if it can see the revenant, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself on a success.

variant.name: Revenants with Spells and Weapons
entries: Revenants that were spellcasters before they died might retain some or all of their spellcasting capabilities. Similarly, revenants that wore armor and wielded weapons in life might continue to do so.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the rhinoceros moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The roc has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The roc fa dos atacs: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d6 + 9}) de dany tallant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 19} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the roc can't use its talons on another target.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si roper es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal cave formation, such as a stalagmite.

trait.name: Grasping Tendrils
entries: The roper can have up to six tendrils at a time. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the roper, which can extrude a replacement tendril on its next turn. A tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a {@dc 15} Força check against it.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The roper pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The roper fa quatre atacs with its tendrils, uses Reel, and makes one attack with its bite.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 50 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and has disadvantage on Força checks and Força saving throws, and the roper can't use the same tendril on another target.

action.name: Reel
entries: The roper pulls each creature {@condition grappled} by it up to 25 feet straight toward it.

monster.name: Rug of Smothering
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Debilitat Antimàgica
entries: The rug is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the rug must succeed on a Constitució saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: Damage Transfer
entries: While it is grappling a creature, the rug takes only half the damage dealt to it, and the creature {@condition grappled} by the rug takes the other half.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si rug es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal rug.

action.name: Smother
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}The creature is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, {@condition blinded}, and at risk of suffocating, and the rug can't smother another target. In addition, at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Iron Scent
entries: The rust monster can pinpoint, by scent, the location of ferrous metal within 30 feet of it.

trait.name: Rust Metal
entries: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the rust monster corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Non magical ammunition made of metal that hits the rust monster is destroyed after dealing damage.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Antennae
entries: The rust monster corrodes a nonmagical ferrous metal object it can see within 5 feet of it. If the object isn't being worn or carried, the touch destroys a 1-foot cube of it. If the object is being worn or carried by a creature, the creature can make a {@dc 11} Destresa saving throw to avoid the rust monster's touch.

If the object touched is either metal armor or a metal shield being worn or carried, its takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed. If the object touched is a held metal weapon, it rusts as described in the Rust Metal trait.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The tiger has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: Si el tiger es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Urpa, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 14}. Si falla, està {@condition prone}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition prone}, el tiger pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The sahuagin té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sahuagin makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or spear.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The sahuagin té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sahuagin fa tres atacs: one with his bite and two with his claws or trident.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The sahuagin és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 6. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The sahuagin té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sahuagin makes two melee attacks: one with her bite and one with her claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the salamander or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc.

trait.name: Heated Weapons
entries: Any metal melee weapon the salamander wields deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc on a hit (included in the attack).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The salamander fa dos atacs: one with its spear and one with its tail.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, the salamander can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the salamander can't make atac de cuas against other targets.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The satyr té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Envestir
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

variant.name: Satyr Pipes
entries: A satyr might carry panpipes that it can play to create magical effects. Usually, only one satyr in a group carries such pipes. If a satyr has pipes, it gains the following additional action option.

entries.name: Panpipes
entries: The satyr plays its pipes and chooses one of the following magical effects: a charming melody, a frightening strain, or a gentle lullaby. Any creature within 60 feet of the satyr that can hear the pipes must succeed on a {@dc 13} Saviesa saving throw or be affected as described below. Other satyrs and creature that can't be {@condition charmed} are unaffected

An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to these panpipes for the next 24 hours.

entries.name: Charming Melody
entries: The creature is {@condition charmed} by the satyr for 1 minute. If the satyr or any of its companions harms the creature, the effect on it ends immediately.

entries.name: Frightening Strain
entries: The creature is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute.

entries.name: Gentle Lullaby
entries: The creature falls asleep and is {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. The effect ends if the creature takes damage or if someone takes an action to shake the creature awake.

monster.name: Scarecrow
languages: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the scarecrow remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary, inanimate scarecrow.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The scarecrow makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the scarecrow's next turn.

action.name: Terrifying Glare
entries: The scarecrow targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the scarecrow, the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Saviesa saving throw or be magically {@condition frightened} until the end of the scarecrow's next turn. The {@condition frightened} target is {@condition paralyzed}.

action.name: Fiblar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}1 piercing damage, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 9}. Qui falli rep 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The scout has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin escoltar or sight.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, ranged 150/600 ft., un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The hag pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Horrific Appearance
entries: Any humanoid that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hag and can see the hag's true form ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 11}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the hag is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a hag's Horrific Appearance durant les properes 24 hores.

Unless the target is surprised or the revelation of the hag's true form is sudden, the target can avert its eyes and avoid making the initial saving throw. Until the start of its next turn, a creature that averts its eyes has disadvantage on attack rolls against the hag.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Death Glare
entries: The hag targets one {@condition frightened} creature she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see the hag, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Saviesa saving throw against this magic or drop to 0 hit points.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like an ugly creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The effect ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have no claws, but someone touching her hand might feel the claws. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a {@dc 16} Intel·ligència (Investigation) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

variant.name: Hag Covens
entries: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is usually chaos.

entries.name: Shared Spellcasting (Coven Only)
headerEntries: While all three members of a hag coven are within 30 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard's spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
footerEntries: For casting these spells, each hag is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intel·ligència as her spellcasting ability. The spell save DC is 12 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier.

entries.name: Hag Eye
entries: A hag coven can craft a magic item called a hag eye, which is made from a real eye coated in varnish and often fitted to a pendant or other wearable item. The hag eye is usually entrusted to a minion for safekeeping and transport. A hag in the coven can take an action to see what the hag eye sees if the hag eye is on the same plane of existence. A hag eye has AC 10, 1 hit point, and darkvision with a radius of 60 feet. If it is destroyed, each coven member takes {@dice 3d10} de dany psíquic and is {@condition blinded} for 24 hours.

A hag coven can have only one hag eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour, and the hags can't perform it while {@condition blinded}. During the ritual, if the hags take any action other than performing the ritual, they must start over.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +6.

trait.name: Sunlight Weakness
entries: While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

action.name: Força Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany necròtic, and the target's Força score is reduced by {@dice 1d4}. The target dies if this reduces its Força to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.
If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse {@dice 1d4} hours later.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The demon pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the demon has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the demon can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany psíquic or, if the demon had advantage on the attack roll, 17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) de dany psíquic.

monster.name: Shambling Mound
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The shambling mound makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}), and the shambling mound uses its Engulf on it.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by it. The engulfed target is {@condition blinded}, {@condition restrained}, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitució saving throw at the start of each of the mound's turns or take 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mound can have only one creature engulfed at a time.

monster.name: Shield Guardian
languages: understands commands given in any language but can't speak

trait.name: Bound
entries: The shield guardian is magically bound to an amulet. As long as the guardian and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet's wearer can telepathically call the guardian to travel to it, and the guardian knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the guardian is within 60 feet of the amulet's wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (rounded up) is transferred to the guardian.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The shield guardian regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Spell Storing
entries: A spellcaster who wears the shield guardian's amulet can cause the guardian to store one spell of 4th level or lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the guardian. The spell has no effect but is stored within the guardian. When commanded to do so by the wearer or when a situation arises that was predefined by the spellcaster, the guardian casts the stored spell with any parameters set by the original caster, sense requerir components. When the spell is cast or a new spell is stored, any previously stored spell is lost.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The guardian makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

reaction.name: Shield
entries: When a creature makes an attack against the wearer of the guardian's amulet, the guardian grants a +2 bonus to the wearer's AC if the guardian is within 5 feet of the wearer.

monster.name: Shrieker
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the shrieker remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

action.name: Shriek
entries: When bright light or a creature is within 30 feet of the shrieker, it emits a shriek audible within 300 feet of it. The shrieker continues to shriek until the disturbance moves out of range and for {@dice 1d4} of the shrieker's turns afterward.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Cold Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales an icy blast en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de fred; si supera, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Paralyzing Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales paralyzing gas en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

monster.name: Esquelet
languages: comprèn els idiomes que comprenia en vida però no pot parlar

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The slaad té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Dia)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell dancing lights}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Carisma.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it leaves behind a cloud of smoke that fills a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on its space. The sphere is heavily obscured. Wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise lasts for 1 minute.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cinder Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of smoldering ash. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a {@dc 10} Destresa saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the mephit's next turn.

variant.name: Summon Mephits (1/Dia)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The solar's spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 25} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Armes Angelicals
entries: Els atacs armats de The solar's són màgics. Quan the solar impacta amb qualsevol arma, fa {@dice 6d8} de dany radiant extra (inclòs a l'atac).

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The solar knows if it hears a lie.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The solar té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The solar makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) de dany tallant mes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany radiant.

action.name: Slaying Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) de dany perforant mes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany radiant. If the target is a creature that has 100 hit points or fewer, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitució saving throw or die.

action.name: Flying Sword
entries: The solar releases its greatsword to hover magically in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. If the solar can see the sword, the solar can mentally command it as a bonus action to fly up to 50 feet and either make one attack against a target or return to the solar's hands. If the hovering sword is targeted by any effect, the solar is considered to be holding it. The hovering sword falls if the solar dies.

action.name: Toc Curatiu (4/Dia)
entries: The solar touches another creature. The target magically regains 40 ({@dice 8d8 + 4}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The solar magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Searing Burst (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The solar emits magical, divine energy. Each creature of its choice in a 10-foot radius ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 23}. Qui falli rep 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de foc mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany radiant; si supera, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Blinding Gaze (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The solar targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see it, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until magic such as the {@spell lesser restoration} spell removes the blindness.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: The spectator shoots up to two of the following magical eye rays at one or two creatures it can see within 90 feet of it. It can use each ray only once on a turn.

items.name: 1. Confusion Ray.
items.entry: The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Saviesa saving throw, or it can't take reactions fins el final del seu proper torn. On its turn, the target can't move, and it uses its action to make a melee or ranged attack against a randomly determined creature within range. If the target can't attack, it does nothing on its turn.

items.name: 2. Paralyzing Ray.
items.entry: The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 3. Fear Ray.
items.entry: The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the spectator is visible to the target, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 4. Wounding Ray.
items.entry: L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany necròtic; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Create Food and Water
entries: The spectator magically creates enough food and water to sustain itself for 24 hours.

reaction.name: Spell Reflection
entries: If the spectator makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses it, the spectator can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 30 feet of it. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the spectator. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

monster.name: Specter
languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The specter pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the specter has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Drenar Vida
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitució saving throw or se li redueixen tants punts de cop màxims com dany hagi rebut. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The spider pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}1 piercing damage, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 9} o take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de verí.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The devil doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Limited Spines
entries: The devil has twelve tail spines. Used spines regrow by the time the devil finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The devil té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The devil fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its fork or two with its tail spines.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Fork
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Tail Spine
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 20/80 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The naga is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics), and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it dies, the naga returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only a {@spell wish} spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 31 ({@damage 7d8}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 de dany tallant.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 40/160 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 10} o become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. If its saving throw result is 5 or lower, the {@condition poisoned} target falls {@condition unconscious} for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

action.name: Heart Sight
entries: The sprite touches a creature and magically knows the creature's current emotional state. If the target fails a {@dc 10} Carisma saving throw, the sprite also knows the creature's alignment. Celestials, fiends, and undead automatically fail the saving throw.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The sprite magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks or casts a spell, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the sprite wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

trait.name: Acció Astuta
entries: On each of its turns, the spy pot Córrer, Destravar-se o Amagar-se com a acció bonus.

trait.name: Atac Furtiu (1/Torn)
entries: The spy deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The spy fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Dia)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell blur}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Carisma.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a cloud of steam. Each creature within 5 feet of the mephit must succeed on a {@dc 10} Destresa saving throw or take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany tallant mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Steam Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of scalding steam. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a {@dc 10} Destresa saving throw. Qui falli rep 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat.

variant.name: Summon Mephits (1/Dia)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

action.name: Blood Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant, and the stirge attaches to the target. While attached, the stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the stirge's turns, the target loses 5 ({@dice 1d4 + 3}) hit points due to blood loss.

The stirge can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. It does so after it drains 10 hit points of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the stirge.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The giant has advantage on Destresa (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Rock Catching
entries: If a rock or similar object is hurled at the giant, the giant can, with a successful {@dc 10} Destresa saving throw, catch the missile and take no dany contundent from it.

variant.name: New Giant Options
entries: Some adult stone giants like to grab enemies and fling them through the air. They can also roll boulders across the ground, striking multiple enemies in a line. These abilities are represented by the following action options.

entries.name: Fling
entries: The giant tries to throw a Small or Medium creature within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Destresa saving throw or be hurled up to 60 feet horizontally in a direction of the giant's choice and land {@condition prone}, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent for every 10 feet it was thrown.

entries.name: Rolling Rock
entries: The giant sends a rock tumbling along the ground in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 17}, taking 22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de dany contundent and falling {@condition prone} on a failed save

monster.name: Stone Golem

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

languages: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The golem té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The golem's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Slow {@recharge 5}
entries: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The giant's és Saviesa ({@dc 17} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The giant pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}30 ({@damage 6d6 + 9}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}35 ({@damage 4d12 + 9}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Llança de Llamp {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 17}. Qui falli rep 54 ({@damage 12d8}) de dany elèctric; si supera, en rep la meitat.

variant.name: New Giant Options
entries: Some adult storm giants can channel thunderous power through their bodies and release it with a deafening stomp. This ability is represented by the following action option.

entries.name: Thunderous Stomp {@recharge}
entries: The storm giant stomps the ground, triggering a thunderclap. All other creatures within 15 feet of the giant must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitució saving throw or take 33 ({@damage 6d10}) de dany de tro and be {@condition deafened} until the start of the giant's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition deafened}. The thunderclap can be heard out to a range of 1,200 feet.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: The fiend ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature it has {@condition charmed}. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Without wings, the fiend loses its flying speed. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

action.name: Claw (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Charm
entries: One humanoid the fiend can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Saviesa saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the fiend's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours.
The fiend can have only un objectiu {@condition charmed} at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

action.name: Draining Kiss
entries: The fiend kisses a creature {@condition charmed} by it or a willing creature. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} against this magic, taking 32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) de dany psíquic on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Eterietat
entries: The fiend magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The swarm can't use its visió a cegues while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The swarm has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin escoltar.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny bat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany perforant, o 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

A creature reduced to 0 hit points by a swarm of centipedes is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny snake. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant, o 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10}. Qui falli rep 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The swarm té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny quipper. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The swarm can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The swarm has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant, o 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny raven. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Beaks
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant, o 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The swarm pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the swarm knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The swarm ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the tarrasque falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The tarrasque té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Reflective Carapace
entries: Any time the tarrasque is targeted by a {@spell magic missile} spell, a line spell, or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 1 to 5, the tarrasque is unaffected. On a 6, the tarrasque is unaffected, and the effect is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the tarrasque, turning the caster into the target.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The tarrasque fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tarrasque can use its Frightful Presence. It then fa cinc atacs: one with its bite, two with its claws, one with its horns, and one with its tail. It can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the tarrasque can't bite another target.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}32 ({@damage 4d10 + 10}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 10}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Presència Aterradora
entries: Each creature of the tarrasque's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Saviesa saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the tarrasque is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a tarrasque's Frightful Presence durant les properes 24 hores.

action.name: Empassar
entries: The tarrasque makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the tarrasque, and it takes 56 ({@damage 16d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the tarrasque's turns.

If the tarrasque takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the tarrasque must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitució saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the tarrasque. If the tarrasque dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The tarrasque makes one claw attack or atac de cua.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The tarrasque moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Chomp (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The tarrasque makes one bite attack or uses its Swallow.

trait.name: Chameleon Carapace
entries: The thri-kreen can change the color of its carapace to match the color and texture of its surroundings. As a result, it has advantage on Destresa (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The thri-kreen's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The thri-kreen fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 11} o be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} in this way. L'objectiu {@condition poisoned} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany tallant.

variant.name: Thri-kreen Weapons and Psionics
entries: Some thri-kreen employ special martial weapons. A gythka is a two-handed polearm with a blade at each end. A chatkcha is a flat, triangular wedge with three serrated blades (a light thrown weapon). A thri-kreen armed with a gythka and chatkchas gains the following action options:

entries.name: Weapons Multiattack
entries: The thri-kreen makes two gythka attacks or two chatkcha attacks.

entries.name: Gythka
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany tallant.

entries.name: Chatkcha
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.
A few thri-kreen manifest psionic abilities, using their powers to aid the hunt and communicate more easily with outsiders.
A psionic thri-kreen has telepathy out to a range of 60 feet and gains the following additional trait:

entries.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: The thri-kreen's innate spellcasting ability is Saviesa. The thri-kreen pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The thug has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The thug fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Maça
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The tiger has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: Si el tiger es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Urpa, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 13}. Si falla, està {@condition prone}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition prone}, el tiger pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si treant es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal tree.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The treant fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The treant makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 60/180 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Animate Trees (1/Dia)
entries: The treant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a {@creature treant}, except they have Intel·ligència and Carisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the treant. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the treant dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the treant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: Si el triceratops es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Tossada, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 13}. Si falla, està {@condition prone}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition prone}, el triceratops pot fer un atac Esclafar com a acció bonus.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Esclafar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura {@condition prone} . {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de dany contundent

trait.name: Ideologia Axiomàtica
entries: The tridrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Desintegració
entries: If the tridrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tridrone makes three fist attacks or three javelin attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant.

variant.name: Rogue Modrons
entries: A modron unit sometimes becomes defective, either through natural decay or exposure to chaotic forces. Rogue modrons don't act in accordance with Primus's wishes and directives, breaking laws, disobeying orders, and even engaging in violence. Other modrons hunt down such rogues.
A rogue modron loses the Axiomatic Mind trait and can have any alignment other than lawful neutral. Otherwise, it has the same statistics as a regular modron of its rank.

trait.name: Chameleon Skin
entries: The troglodyte has advantage on Destresa (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The troglodyte fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The troll has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The troll fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

variant.name: Loathsome Limbs
entries: Whenever the troll takes at least 15 slashing damage at one time, roll a {@dice d20} to determine what else happens to it:

items.name: 1–10:
items.entry: Nothing else happens.

items.name: 11–14:
items.entry: One leg is severed from the troll if it has any legs left.

items.name: 15–18:
items.entry: One arm is severed from the troll if it has any arms left.

items.name: 19–20:
items.entry: The troll is decapitated, but the troll dies only if it can't regenerate. If it dies, so does the severed head.

entries: If the troll finishes a short or long rest without reattaching a severed limb or head, the part regrows. At that point, the severed part dies. Until then, a severed part acts on the troll's initiative and has its own action and movement. A severed part has AC 13, 10 hit points, and the troll's Regeneration trait.
A severed leg is unable to attack and has a speed of 5 feet.

A severed arm has a speed of 5 feet and can make one claw attack on its turn, with disadvantage on the attack roll unless the troll can see the arm and its target. Each time the troll loses an arm, it loses a claw attack.

If its head is severed, the troll loses its bite attack and its body is {@condition blinded} unless the head can see it. The severed head has a speed of 0 feet and the troll's Keen Smell trait. It can make a bite attack but only against a target in its space.

The troll's speed is halved if it's missing a leg. If it loses both legs, it falls {@condition prone}. If it has both arms, it can crawl. With only one arm, it can still crawl, but its speed is halved. With no arms or legs, its speed is 0, and it can't benefit from bonuses to speed.

monster.name: Twig Blight
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si blight es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un dead shrub.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tyrannosaurus fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The ultroloth's és Saviesa ({@dc 17} per salvar conjur). The ultroloth pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The ultroloth té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The ultroloth's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The ultroloth can use its Hypnotic Gaze and fa tres atacs melé.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Hypnotic Gaze
entries: The ultroloth's eyes sparkle with opalescent light as it targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the ultroloth, the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Saviesa saving throw against this magic or be {@condition charmed} until the end of the ultroloth's next turn. The {@condition charmed} target is {@condition stunned}. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the ultroloth's gaze for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The ultroloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

variant.name: Yugoloth Summoning
entries: Some yugoloths have an action option that allows them to summon other yugoloths.

entries.name: Summon Yugoloth (1/Dia)
entries: The yugoloth chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
An ultroloth has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d6} {@creature mezzoloth||mezzoloths}, {@dice 1d4} {@creature nycaloth||nycaloths}, or one ultroloth.

A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.

trait.name: Confusing Gaze
entries: When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the umber hulk and is able to see the umber hulk's eyes, the umber hulk can magically force it to make a {@dc 15} Carisma saving throw, unless the umber hulk is {@condition incapacitated}.

On a failed saving throw, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a {@dice d8} to determine what it does during that turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action but uses all its movement to move in a random direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes one melee attack against a random creature, or it does nothing if no creature is within reach.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the umber hulk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the umber hulk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

trait.name: Tuneladora
entries: The umber hulk can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5 foot-wide, 8-foot-high tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The umber hulk fa tres atacs: two with its claws and one with its mandibles.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany tallant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The unicorn és Carisma ({@dc 14} per salvar conjur). The unicorn pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the unicorn moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The unicorn té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The unicorn's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The unicorn fa dos atacs: one with its hooves and one with its horn.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Toc Curatiu (3/Dia)
entries: The unicorn touches another creature with its horn. The target magically regains 11 ({@dice 2d8 + 2}) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

action.name: Teleportar (1/Dia)
entries: The unicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 feet of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the unicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

legendary.name: Hooves
entries: The unicorn makes one attack with its hooves.

legendary.name: Escut de Pampallugues (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's next turn.

legendary.name: Auto Curació (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The unicorn magically regains 11 ({@dice 2d8 + 2}) hit points.

monster.name: Vampire
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: If the vampire isn't in sunlight or running water, it can use its action to polymorph into a Tiny bat or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.

While in bat form, the vampire can't speak, its walking speed is 5 feet, and it has a flying speed of 30 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Força, Destresa, and Constitució saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.
