trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the vampire falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Misty Escape
entries: When it drops to 0 hit points outside its resting place, the vampire transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling {@condition unconscious}, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its vampire form, and it must abast its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its vampire form. It is then {@condition paralyzed} until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The vampire regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The vampire pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the following flaws:
{@i Forbiddance.} The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
{@i Harmed by Running Water.} The vampire takes 20 acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

{@i Stake to the Heart.} If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place, the vampire is {@condition paralyzed} until the stake is removed.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity.} The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

action.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
entries: The vampire fa dos atacs, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.name: Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape {@dc 18}).

action.name: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one willing creature, or a creature that is {@condition grappled} by the vampire, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a {@creature vampire spawn} under the vampire's control.

action.name: Charm
entries: The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Saviesa saving throw against this magic or be {@condition charmed} by the vampire. The {@condition charmed} target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the vampire's control, it takes the vampire's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the vampire's bite attack.

Each time the vampire or the vampire's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

action.name: Children of the Night (1/Dia)
entries: The vampire magically calls {@dice 2d4} swarms of {@creature swarm of bats||bats} or {@creature swarm of rats||rats}, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, the vampire can call {@dice 3d6} {@creature wolf||wolves} instead. The called creatures arrive in {@dice 1d4} rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The vampire moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: The vampire makes one unarmed strike.

legendary.name: Bite (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The vampire makes one bite attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Vine Blight
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si blight es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un tangle of vines.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany contundent, and a Large or smaller target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the blight can't constrict another target.

action.name: Entangling Plants {@recharge 5}
entries: Grasping roots and vines sprout in a 15-foot radius centered on the blight, withering away after 1 minute. For the duration, that area is difficult terrain for nonplant creatures. In addition, each creature of the blight's choice in that area when the plants appear must succeed on a {@dc 12} Força saving throw or become {@condition restrained}. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 12} Força check, freeing it self or another entangled creature within abast on a success.

monster.name: Violet Fungus
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the violet fungus remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The fungus makes {@dice 1d4} Rotting Touch attacks.

action.name: Rotting Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany necròtic.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The vrock té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The vrock fa dos atacs: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Spores {@recharge}
entries: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the vrock. The spores spread around corners. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitució saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, a target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de verí at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Emptying a vial of holy water on the target also ends the effect on it.

action.name: Stunning Screech (1/Dia)
entries: The vrock emits a horrific screech. Each creature within 20 feet of it that can hear it and that isn't a demon must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the vrock's next turn.

variant.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A vrock has a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 2d4} {@creature dretch||dretches} or one vrock.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Oída i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The vulture has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista or smell.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The vulture has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the horse moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the horse can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

variant.name: Warhorse Armor
entries: An armored warhorse has an AC based on the type of barding worn (see the Player's Handbook for more information on barding). The horse's AC includes its Destresa modifier, where applicable. Barding doesn't alter the horse's challenge rating.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Water Form
entries: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Freeze
entries: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 feet fins el final del seu proper torn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Whelm {@recharge 4}
entries: Each creature in the elemental's space ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 15}. On a failure, a target takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent. If it is Large or smaller, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained} and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space.

The elemental can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at one time. At the start of each of the elemental's turns, each target {@condition grappled} by it takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a {@dc 14} Força check and succeeding.

trait.name: Invisible in Water
entries: The water weird is {@condition invisible} while fully immersed in water.

trait.name: Water Bound
entries: The water weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) de dany contundent. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}) and pulled 5 feet toward the water weird. Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, the water weird tries to drown it, and the water weird can't constrict another target.

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The weasel has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin escoltar or smell.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}1 piercing damage.

walk.condition: (40 ft., climb 30 ft. in bear or hybrid form)

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The werebear can use its action to polymorph into a Large bear-humanoid hybrid or into a Large bear, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size and AC, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The werebear has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Multi-atac

However, you can also use the statistics to represent nonhuman lycanthropes, adding verisimilitude by allowing a nonhuman lycanthrope to retain one or more of its humanoid racial traits. For example, an elf werewolf might have the Fey Ancestry trait.

Si falla, està {@condition prone}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition prone}, el weretiger pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The wight makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use its Drenar Vida in place of one longsword attack.

action.name: Drenar Vida
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany necròtic. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitució saving throw or se li redueixen tants punts de cop màxims com dany hagi rebut. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a {@creature zombie} under the wight's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

action.name: Espasa llarga

languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Consume Life
entries: As a bonus action, the will-o'-wisp can target one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitució saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points.

trait.name: Ephemeral
entries: The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The will-o'-wisp pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Variable Illumination
entries: The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5 to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.

action.name: Shock
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany elèctric.

action.name: Invisibility

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The xorn has advantage on Destresa (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Treasure Sense
entries: The xorn can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of it.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The xorn makes three claw attacks and one bite attack.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Fear of Fire
entries: If the yeti takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The yeti has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The yeti has advantage on Destresa (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Chilling Gaze
entries: The yeti targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitució saving throw against this magic or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred and then be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute, unless it is immune to cold damage. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. If the target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to the Chilling Gaze of all yetis (but not abominable yetis) for 1 hour.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The yochlol's spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 14} salvació de conjur). The yochlol pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The yochlol can use its action to polymorph into a form that resembles a female drow or giant spider, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The yochlol té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The yochlol pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The yochlol ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The yochlol fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Slam (Bite in Spider Form)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, abast 5 ft. (10 feet in demon form), un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@dice 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning (piercing in spider form) damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Mist Form
entries: The yochlol transforms into toxic mist or reverts to its true form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is also transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

While in mist form, the yochlol is {@condition incapacitated} and can't speak. It has a flying speed of 30 feet, can hover, and can pass through any space that isn't airtight. It has advantage on Força, Destresa, and Constitució saving throws, and it is immune to nonmagical damage.

While in mist form, the yochlol can enter a creature's space and stop there. Each time that creature starts its turn with the yochlol in its space, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target is {@condition incapacitated}.

variant.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A yochlol has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning one yochlol.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

items.name: Slowing Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales gas en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitució saving throw. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Abomination Form Only)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The yuan-ti's és Saviesa ({@dc 15} per salvar conjur). The yuan-ti pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Large snake, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The yuan-ti té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multiattack (Abomination Form Only)
entries: The yuan-ti makes two ranged attacks or three melee attacks, but can use its bite and constrict attacks only once each.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the yuan-ti can't constrict another target.

action.name: Scimitar (Abomination Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.
